rajaḥ ca eva tu rājaḥ ca svarṇapādaḥ tathā eva ca

original: puṣṭirvidhiśca vai devā daśaite rohitāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_3,1.86 //
analyzed: puṣṭiḥ vidhiḥ ca vai devāḥ daśā ete rohitāḥ smṛtāḥ
tuṣta ādyāḥ tu ye devāḥ trayaḥ triṃśat prakīrtitāḥ

original: te vai sumanaso vedyānnibodhata sukarmaṇaḥ // BndP_3,1.87 //
analyzed: te vai sumanasaḥ vedyān nibodhata sukarmaṇaḥ
su parvā vṛṣabhaḥ pṛṣṭā kapi dyumna vipaścitaḥ

original: vikramaśca kramaścaiva vibhṛtaḥ kānta eva ca // BndP_3,1.88 //
analyzed: vikramaḥ ca kramaḥ ca eva vibhṛtaḥ kāntaḥ eva ca
ete devāḥ su karmāṇaḥ sutarān ca nibodhata
varṣaḥ divyaḥ tathā añjiṣṭhaḥ varcasvī dyutimān kaviḥ
śubhaḥ haviḥ kṛtaprāptiḥ vyāpṛtaḥ daśamaḥ tathā

original: sutārā nāmatastvete devā vai saṃprakīrtitāḥ // BndP_3,1.90 //
analyzed: sutārāḥ nāmataḥ tu ete devāḥ vai saṃprakīrtitāḥ
teṣām indraḥ tu vijñeyaḥ ṛta dhāmā mahā yaśāḥ
dyutiḥ vasiṣṭha putraḥ tu ātreyaḥ sutapāḥ tathā
tapomūrtiḥ tu āṅgirasaḥ tapasvī kāśyapaḥ tathā
tapodhanaḥ ca paulastyaḥ paulahaḥ ca taporatiḥ
bhārgavaḥ saptamaḥ teṣām vijñeyaḥ tu tapodhṛtiḥ

original: ete saptarṣayaḥ siddhā antye sāvarṇikeṃ'tare // BndP_3,1.93 //
analyzed: ete sapta ṛṣayaḥ siddhāḥ antye sāvarṇika iṃtare
devavān upadevaḥ ca devaśreṣṭhaḥ vidūrathaḥ
mitravān mitrasenaḥ tha citrasenaḥ hi amitra hā
mitrabāhuḥ suvarcāḥ ca dvādaśasya manoḥ sutāḥ

original: trayodaśetu paryāye bhāvye raucyentare punaḥ // BndP_3,1.95 //
analyzed: trayodaśe tu paryāye bhāvye raucye intare punar

original: traya eva gaṇāḥ proktā devānāṃ tu svayaṃbhuvā /
analyzed: trayaḥ eva gaṇāḥ proktāḥ devānām tu svayaṃbhuvā

original: brahmaṇo mānasāḥ putrāste hi sarve mahātmanaḥ // BndP_3,1.96 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ mānasāḥ putrāḥ te hi sarve mahātmanaḥ
sutrāmāṇaḥ sudharmāṇaḥ sukarmāṇaḥ ca te trayaḥ

original: tridaśānāṃ gaṇāḥ proktā bhaviṣyāḥ somapāyinām // BndP_3,1.97 //
analyzed: tridaśānām gaṇāḥ proktāḥ bhaviṣyāḥ soma pāyinām
trayastriśat devatāḥ yāḥ pṛthak ijyāḥ tu yājñikaiḥ

original: ājyena pṛṣadājyena grahaśreṣṭena caiva ha // BndP_3,1.98 //
analyzed: ājyena pṛṣadājyena grahaśreṣṭena ca eva ha
ye vai devāḥ trayastriṃśat pṛthaktvena nibodhata

original: sutrāmāṇaḥ prayājyāstu ājyāśā ye tu sāṃpratam // BndP_3,1.99 //
analyzed: su trāmāṇaḥ prayājyāḥ tu ājya āśāḥ ye tu sāṃpratam
su karmāṇaḥ nuyājyā ākhyāḥ pṛṣadājya āśinaḥ tu ye

original: upayājyāḥ sudharmāṇa iti devāḥ prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_3,1.100 //
analyzed: upayājyāḥ sudharmāṇaḥ iti devāḥ prakīrttitāḥ
divaspatiḥ mahā satvaḥ teṣām indraḥ bhaviṣyati
pulaha ātmaja putrāḥ te vijñeyāḥ tu ruceḥ sutāḥ
aṅgirāḥ ca eva dhṛtimān paulastyaḥ pi avyayaḥ tu saḥ
paulahaḥ tattvadarśī bhārgavaḥ ca nirupsukaḥ
niṣprakaṃpyaḥ tathā ātreyaḥ nirmohaḥ kāśyapaḥ tathā

original: sutapāścaiva vāsiṣṭhaḥ saptaite tu trayodaśa // BndP_3,1.103 //
analyzed: sutapāḥ ca eva vāsiṣṭhaḥ saptā ete tu trayodaśa

original: citraseno vicitraśca nayo dharmo dhṛto bhavaḥ /
analyzed: citrasenaḥ vicitraḥ ca nayaḥ dharmaḥ dhṛtaḥ bhavaḥ

original: anekaḥ kṣatraviddhaśca suraso nirbhayo daśa // BndP_3,1.104 //
analyzed: anekaḥ kṣatra viddhaḥ ca surasaḥ nirbhayaḥ daśa

original: raucyasyaite manoḥ putrā hyantare tu trayodaśe /
analyzed: raucyasya ete manoḥ putrāḥ hi antare tu trayodaśe

original: caturdaśe tu paryāye bhautyasyāpyantare manoḥ // BndP_3,1.105 //
analyzed: caturdaśe tu paryāye bhautyasya api antare manoḥ

original: devatānāṃ gaṇāḥ pañca proktā ye tu bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: devatānām gaṇāḥ pañca proktāḥ ye tu bhaviṣyati
cākṣuṣāḥ ca pavitrāḥ ca kaniṣṭhāḥ bhrājitāḥ tathā
vācāvṛddhāḥ ca iti ete pañca deva gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: niṣādādyāḥ svarāḥ sapta sapta tānviddhi cākṣuṣān // BndP_3,1.107 //
analyzed: niṣāda ādyāḥ svarāḥ sapta sapta tān viddhi cākṣuṣān
bṛhat ādyāni sāmāni kaniṣṭhān sapta tān viduḥ

original: sapta lokāḥ pavitrāste bhrājitāḥ saptasiṃdhavaḥ // BndP_3,1.108 //
analyzed: sapta lokāḥ pavitrāḥ te bhrājitāḥ sapta siṃdhavaḥ
vācāvṛddhān ṛṣīn viddhi manoḥ svāyabhuvasya ye
sarve manvantara idrāḥ ca vijñeyāḥ tulya lakṣaṇāḥ
tejasā tapasā vuddhyā bala śruta parākramaiḥ

original: trailokye yāni sattvāni gatimanti dhruvāṇi ca // BndP_3,1.110 //
analyzed: trailokye yāni sattvāni gatimanti dhruvāṇi ca
sarvaśas sarvaiḥ guṇaiḥ tāni indrāḥ te bhibhavanti vai
bhūta apavādinaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ madhyasthāḥ bhūta vādinaḥ
bhūta abha vādinaḥ śaktāḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ pravādinām

original: agnīdhraḥ kāśyapaścaiva paulastyo māgadhaśca yaḥ // BndP_3,1.112 //
analyzed: agnīdhraḥ kāśyapaḥ ca eva paulastyaḥ māgadhaḥ ca yaḥ
bhārgavaḥ hi agnivāhuḥ ca śuciḥ āṅgirasaḥ tathā

original: śukraścaiva tu vāsiṣṭhaḥ paulaho mukta eva ca // BndP_3,1.113 //
analyzed: śukraḥ ca eva tu vāsiṣṭhaḥ paulahaḥ muktaḥ eva ca
ātreyaḥ śvājitaḥ proktaḥ manu putrān atas śṛṇu

original: ururguruśca gaṃbhīro buddhaḥ śuddhaḥ śuciḥ kṛtī // BndP_3,1.114 //
analyzed: uruḥ guruḥ ca gaṃbhīraḥ buddhaḥ śuddhaḥ śuciḥ kṛtī
ūrjasvī subalaḥ ca eva bhautyasya ete manoḥ sutāḥ

original: sāvarṇā manavo hyete catvāro brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ // BndP_3,1.115 //
analyzed: sāvarṇāḥ manavaḥ hi ete catvāraḥ brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ
ekaḥ vaivasvataḥ ca eva sāvarṇaḥ manuḥ ucyate

original: raucyo bhautyaśca yau tau tu matau paulahabhārgavau /
analyzed: raucyaḥ bhautyaḥ ca yau tau tu matau paulaha bhārgavau

original: bhautyasyaivādhipatye tu tūrṇaṃ kalpastu pūryate // BndP_3,1.116 //
analyzed: bhautyasya eva ādhipatye tu tūrṇam kalpaḥ tu pūryate
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: niḥśeṣeṣu tu sarveṣu tadā manvantareṣviha // BndP_3,1.117 //
analyzed: niḥśeṣeṣu tu sarveṣu tadā manvantareṣu iha
ante na eka yuge tasmin kṣīṇe saṃhāraḥ ucyate

original: saptaite bhārgavā devā ante manvantare tadā // BndP_3,1.118 //
analyzed: sapta ete bhārgavāḥ devāḥ ante manvantare tadā
bhuktvā yuga ākhyāḥ hi ekasaptatīḥ

original: pitṛbhirmanubhiḥ sārddhaṃ kṣīṇe manvantare tadā // BndP_3,1.119 //
analyzed: pitṛbhiḥ manubhiḥ sārddham kṣīṇe manvantare tadā
anādhāram idam sarvam trailokyam vai bhaviṣyati

original: tataḥ sthānā ni śubhrāṇi sthānināṃ tāni vai tadā // BndP_3,1.120 //
analyzed: tatas sthānā ni śubhrāṇi sthāninām tāni vai tadā
vimuktāni tārāḥ ṛkṣa grahaiḥ tathā
tatas teṣu vyatīteṣu trailokyasya īśvareṣu iha
saṃprapteṣu mahar lokam yasmin te kalpa vāsinaḥ
ajita ādyāḥ gaṇāḥ yatra āyuṣmantaḥ caturdaśa
manvantareṣu sarveṣu devāḥ te vai caturddaśa
sa śarīrāḥ ca śrūyante jana loke saha anugāḥ
evam deveṣu atīteṣu mahar lokāt janam prati

original: bhūtādiṣvavaśiṣṭeṣu sthāvarāṃ teṣu teṣu vai // BndP_3,1.124 //
analyzed: bhūta ādiṣu avaśiṣṭeṣu sthāvarām teṣu teṣu vai
śūnyeṣu lokasthāneṣu mahānteṣu bhuva ādiṣu

original: deveṣu ca gateṣvūrddhvaṃ sāyujyaṃ kalpavāsinām // BndP_3,1.125 //
analyzed: deveṣu ca gateṣu ūrddhvam sāyujyam kalpa vāsinām
saṃhṛtya tāḥ tatas brahmā deva ṛṣi pitṛ dānavān
saṃsthāpayati vai sargam ahar dṛṣṭvā yuga kṣaye
caturyuga sahasra antam ahar yat brahmaṇaḥ viduḥ
rātrim yuga sahasra antām te horātra vidaḥ janāḥ
naimittikaḥ prākṛtikaḥ yaḥ ca eva ātyantikaḥ ṛthataḥ
tri vidhiḥ sarva bhūtānām iti eṣa pratisaṃcaraḥ
brāhmaḥ naimittikaḥ tasya kalpa dāhaḥ prasaṃyamaḥ

original: pratisarge tu bhūtānāṃ prākṛtaḥ karaṇakṣayaḥ // BndP_3,1.129 //
analyzed: pratisarge tu bhūtānām prākṛtaḥ karaṇa kṣayaḥ
jñānāt ca ātyantikaḥ proktaḥ kāraṇānām asaṃbhavaḥ
tatas saṃhṛtya tān brahmā devān trailokya vāsinaḥ
praharati prakurute sargasya pralayam punar
suṣupsuḥ bhagavān brahmā prajāḥ saṃharate tadā
tatas yuga sahasra ante saṃprāpte ca yuga kṣaye

original: tatrātmasthāḥ prajāḥ kartuṃ prapede sa prajāpatiḥ // BndP_3,1.132 //
analyzed: tatra ātma sthāḥ prajāḥ kartum prapede sa prajāpatiḥ
tadā bhavati anāvṛṣṭiḥ saṃtatā śata vārṣikī
tayā yāni alpa sārāṇi sattvāni vṛthivī tale
tāni eva atra pralīyante bhūmi tvam upayānti ca
sapta raśmiḥ atha u bhūtvā udattiṣṭhat vibhāvasuḥ
asahya raśmiḥ bhagavān pibati aṃbhaḥ
harītā raśmayaḥ tasya dīpyamānāḥ tu saptatiḥ
bhūyas eva vivarttante vyāpnuvantaḥ uṃbaram śanais

original: bhaumaṃ kāṣṭhendhanaṃ tejo bhṛśamadbhistu dīpyate // BndP_3,1.136 //
analyzed: bhaumam kāṣṭha indhanam tejaḥ bhṛśam adbhiḥ tu dīpyate
tasmāt udaka bhṛt sūryaḥ tapati iti hi kathyate

original: nāvṛṣṭyā tapate sūryyo nāvṛṣṭyā pariṣicyate // BndP_3,1.137 //
analyzed: na avṛṣṭyā tapate sūryaḥ na avṛṣṭyā pariṣicyate
na avṛṣṭyā pariviśyeta vāriṇā dīpyate raviḥ

original: tasmādapaḥ pibanyo vai dīpyate raviraṃbare // BndP_3,1.138 //
analyzed: tasmāt apaḥ piban yaḥ vai dīpyate raviḥ aṃbare

original: tasya te raśmayaḥ sapta pibantyaṃbho mahārṇavāt /
analyzed: tasya te raśmayaḥ sapta pibanti aṃbhaḥ mahā arṇavāt

original: tenāhāreṇa saṃdīptāḥ sūryāḥ sapta bhavantyuta // BndP_3,1.139 //
analyzed: tena āhāreṇa saṃdīptāḥ sūryāḥ sapta bhavanti uta
tatas te raśmayaḥ sapta sūrya bhūtāḥ caturddiśam
catur lokam imam sarvam dahanti śikhinaḥ tadā

original: prāpnuvanti ca tābhistu hyūrddhvaṃ cādhaśca raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: prāpnuvanti ca tābhiḥ tu hi ūrddhvam ca adhas ca raśmibhiḥ
dīpyante bhāskarāḥ sapta yuga anta agni pratāpinaḥ
te vāriṇā pradīptāḥ ca bahu sāhasra raśmayaḥ

original: svaṃ samāvṛtya tiṣṭhanti nirdahanto vasuṃdharām // BndP_3,1.142 //
analyzed: svam samāvṛtya tiṣṭhanti nirdahantaḥ vasuṃdharām
tatas teṣām pratāpena dahyamānā vasuṃdharā
sa adri nadī arṇavā pṛthvī nisnehā samapadyata
dīptābhiḥ saṃtatābhiḥ ca citrābhiḥ ca samantataḥ

original: adhaścordhvaṃ ca tiryak ca saṃrūddhā sūryaraśmibhiḥ // BndP_3,1.144 //
analyzed: adhas ca ūrdhvam ca tiryak ca saṃrūddhā sūrya raśmibhiḥ
sūrya agnīnām pravṛddhānām saṃsṛṣṭānām parasparam
eka tvam upayātānām eka jvālā bhavati uta
sarva loka praṇāśaḥ ca saḥ gniḥ bhūtvā anu maṇḍalī
catur lokam idam sarvam nirdahati āśu tejasā
tatas pralīne sarvasmin jaṅgame sthāvare tathā

original: nirvṛkṣā nistṛṇā bhūmiḥ kūrmapṛṣṭhasamā bhavet // BndP_3,1.147 //
analyzed: nirvṛkṣā nistṛṇā bhūmiḥ kūrma pṛṣṭha samā bhavet
aṃbarīṣam iva ābhāti sarvam api akhilam jagat

original: sarvameva tadarcirbhiḥ pūrṇaṃ jājvalyate ghanaḥ // BndP_3,1.148 //
analyzed: sarvam eva tat arcirbhiḥ pūrṇam jājvalyate ghanaḥ
bhū tale yāni sattvāni mahodadhi gatāni ca
tatas tāni pralīyante bhūmi tvam upayānti ca
dvīpāḥ ca parvatāḥ ca eva varṣāṇi atha mahā udadhiḥ

original: sarvaṃ tadbhasmasāccakre sarvātmā pāvakastu saḥ // BndP_3,1.150 //
analyzed: sarvam tat bhasmasāt cakre sarvātmā pāvakaḥ tu saḥ
samudrebhyaḥ nadībhyaḥ ca pātālebhyaḥ ca sarvaśas
pibati apaḥ samiddhaḥ gniḥ pṛthivīm āśritaḥ jvalan
tatas saṃvarddhitaḥ śailān ati kramya grahān tathā
lokān saṃharate dīptaḥ ghoraḥ saṃvarttakaḥ nalaḥ
tatas sa pṛthivīm bhittvā rasātalam aśoṣyat
nirdahya ante tu pātālam vāyu lokam atha adahat

original: adhastātpṛthivīṃ dagdhvā tūrddhvaṃ sa dahato divam /
analyzed: adhastāt pṛthivīm dagdhvā tu ūrddhvam sa dahataḥ divam
yojanānām sahasrāṇi prayutāni arbudāni ca
udatiṣṭhan śikhāḥ tasya bahvyaḥ saṃvarttakasya tu
gandharvān ca piśācān ca sa mahā uraga rākṣasān

original: tadā dahati saṃdīpto golakaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: tadā dahati saṃdīptaḥ golakam ca eva sarvaśas

original: bhūrlokaṃ ca bhuvarllokaṃ svarlokaṃ ca mahastathā // BndP_3,1.156 //
analyzed: bhūrlokam ca bhuvarllokam svar lokam ca mahar tathā
ghoraḥ dahati kālāgniḥ evam loka catuṣṭayam
vyāpteṣu teṣu lokeṣu tiryak ūrddhvam atha agninā
tat tejaḥ samanuprāpya kṛtsnam jagat idam śanais

original: ayoguḍanibhaṃ sarvaṃ tadā hyevaṃ prakāśate // BndP_3,1.158 //
analyzed: ayaḥ guḍa nibham sarvam tadā hi evam prakāśate
tatas gaja kula ākārāḥ taḍidbhiḥ samalaṅkṛtāḥ

original: uttiṣṭhanti tadā ghorā vyomni saṃvartakā ghanāḥ // BndP_3,1.159 //
analyzed: uttiṣṭhanti tadā ghorāḥ vyomni saṃvartakāḥ ghanāḥ
kecid nīlotpala śyāmāḥ kecid kumuda sannibhāḥ
kecid vaiḍūrya saṃkāśāḥ indranīla nibhāḥ pare
śaṅkha kunda nibhāḥ ca anye jāti añjana nibhāḥ tathā
dhūmra varṇāḥ ghanāḥ kecid kecid pītāḥ payodharāḥ
kecid rāsabha varṇa ābhāḥ lākṣā rasa nibhāḥ tathā
mana śilā ābhāḥ tu apare kapota ābhāḥ tathā aṃbudāḥ
indragopa nibhāḥ kecid haritāla nibhāḥ tathā
cāṣa patra nibhāḥ kecid uttiṣṭhanti ghanāḥ divi
kecid puravara ākārāḥ kecid gaja kula upamāḥ
kecid parvata saṃkāśāḥ kecid sthala nibhāḥ ghanāḥ
krīḍā āgāra nibhāḥ kecid kecid mīna kula upamāḥ
bahu rūpāḥ ghora rūpāḥ ghora svara ninādinaḥ
tadā jaladharāḥ sarve pūrayanti nabhaḥ talam
tatas te jaladāḥ ghora rāviṇaḥ bhāskara ātmakāḥ
saptadhā saṃvṛta ātmānaḥ tam agnim śamayanti uta

original: tataste jaladā varṣaṃ muñcanti ca mahaughavat // BndP_3,1.167 //
analyzed: tatas te jaladāḥ varṣam muñcanti ca mahā ogha vat
su ghoram aśivam sarvam nāśayanti ca pāvakam

original: pravṛṣṭaiśca tathātyarthaṃ vāriṇā pūryate jagat // BndP_3,1.168 //
analyzed: pravṛṣṭaiḥ ca tathā atyartham vāriṇā pūryate jagat
adbhiḥ tejaḥ abhibhūtam ca tadā agniḥ praviśati apaḥ

original: naṣṭe cāgnau varṣagate payodāḥ pāvakodbhavāḥ // BndP_3,1.169 //
analyzed: naṣṭe ca agnau varṣa gate payodāḥ pāvaka udbhavāḥ
plāvayantaḥ jagat sarvam bṛhat jala parisravaiḥ
dhārābhiḥ pūrayanti imam codyamānāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
anye tu salila oghaiḥ tu velām abhibhavanti api
sa adri dvīpa antaram pītam jalam anneṣu tiṣṭhati
punar patati bhūmau tad payodhaḥ tāt nabhastale

original: saṃveṣṭayati ghorātmā divi vāyuḥ samatataḥ // BndP_3,1.172 //
analyzed: saṃveṣṭayati ghora ātmā divi vāyuḥ samatataḥ
tasmin eka ārmave ghore naṣṭe sthāvāra jaṅgame

original: pūrme yugasahasre vai niḥśeṣaḥ kalpa ucyate // BndP_3,1.173 //
analyzed: pūrme yuga sahasre vai niḥśeṣaḥ kalpaḥ ucyate
atha aṃbhasa vṛte loke prāhuḥ ekārmavam budhāḥ

original: atha bhūmirjalaṃ khaṃ ca vāyuścaikārmave tadā // BndP_3,1.174 //
analyzed: atha bhūmiḥ jalam kham ca vāyuḥ ca ekārmave tadā
naṣṭe nale ndha bhūte tu prājñāyata na kiñcana

original: pārthivāstvatha sāmudrā āpo daivyāśca sarvaśaḥ // BndP_3,1.175 //
analyzed: pārthivāḥ tu atha sāmudrāḥ āpaḥ daivyāḥ ca sarvaśas
a sarantyaḥ vrajanti aikyam salila ākhyām bhajanti uta

papracchuḥ mātāriśvānam sarve te brahma vādinaḥ
brahma lokaḥ tu bhagavan yāvat mātrā antare prabho

original: krośasya ca parīmāṇaṃ śrotumīcchāma tattvataḥ // BndP_3,2.113 //
analyzed: krośasya ca parīmāṇam śrotum īcchāma tattvataḥ

original: daśaiva mahato bhāgā bhūtādiḥ sthūla ucyate /
analyzed: daśa eva mahataḥ bhāgāḥ bhūtādiḥ sthūlaḥ ucyate

paramāṇuḥ su sūkṣmaḥ tu bhāva grāhyaḥ na cakṣuṣā
yat abhedyatamam loke vijñeyam paramāṇu vat
jāla antara gate yat sūkṣmam dṛśyate rajaḥ
prathamam tad pramāṇānām paramāṇum pracakṣate

trasareṇuḥ samākhyātaḥ tat padma rajaḥ ucyate

original: te 'pyaṣṭau samavāyasthā bālāgraṃ tatsmṛtaṃ budhaiḥ // BndP_3,2.120 //
analyzed: te pi aṣṭau samavāya sthāḥ bālāgram tat smṛtam budhaiḥ

ṣaṇṇavati aṅgulam ca eva dhanuḥ āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: divākarātsahasre tu śate caurddhvaṃ niśākaraḥ // BndP_3,2.129 //

anayoḥ tulya tā yasmāt hāramāḥ ca svabhāvataḥ

vinivṛtteḥ tadā teṣām sthiteḥ ātma nivāsinām
tad kāla vāsinām teṣām tatra vai doṣa darśinām
utpadyate vairāgyam ātma vāda praṇāśanam
bhojya bhoktṛ tva nānātvaiḥ teṣām tad bhāva darśinām
pṛthak jñānena kṣetrajñāḥ tatas te brahma laukikāḥ
prakṛtau kāraṇa atītāḥ sarve nānā pradarśinaḥ
sva ātmani eva avatiṣṭhante praśānta adarśana ātmakāḥ
śuddhāḥ nirañjanāḥ sarve cetana acetanāḥ tathā
tatra eva parinirvāṇāḥ smṛta anāgāminaḥ tu te
nirguṇa tva agniḥ ātmānaḥ prakṛti ante vyatikramāt

original: ityevaṃ prākṛtaḥ proktaḥ pratisargaḥ svayaṃbhuvā // BndP_3,2.312 //
analyzed: iti evam prākṛtaḥ proktaḥ pratisargaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
varṇa āśrama ācāra yutaḥ pratisargam śṛṇoti yaḥ
sa vrajet śiva sālokyam bhaktimān vigata jvaraḥ
amadyapaḥ ca yaḥ śūdraḥ bhava bhaktaḥ jita idriyaḥ
ābhūta saṃplava sthāyī apratīghāta lakṣaṇaḥ

original: gāṇapatyaṃ sa labhate sthānaṃ vā sārvakālikam /
analyzed: gāṇapatyam sa labhate sthānam vā sārvakālikam

original: madyapo madyapaiḥ sārddhaṃ bhūtasaṃghaiśca modate // BndP_3,2.315 //
analyzed: madyapaḥ madyapaiḥ sārddham bhūta saṃghaiḥ ca modate
sevyamānaḥ mahī pṛṣṭhe martyānām vara daḥ bhavaḥ
iti ha uvāca bhagavān vāyuḥ vākyam id avaram

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte uttarabhāge caturtha upasaṃhārapāde śivapuravarṇanaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte uttara bhāge caturthe upasaṃhāra pāde śivapuravarṇanam nāma dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca
pratyāhāram pravakṣyāmi parasya ante svayaṃbhuvaḥ

original: brahmaṇaḥ sthitikāle tu kṣīṇe tasmiṃstadā prabhoḥ // BndP_3,3.1 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ sthiti kāle tu kṣīṇe tasmin tadā prabhoḥ
yathā idam kurute vyaktam su sūkṣmam viśvam īśvaraḥ

original: avyaktaṃ grasate vyaktaṃ pratyāhāre ca kṛtsnaśaḥ // BndP_3,3.2 //
analyzed: avyaktam grasate vyaktam pratyāhāre ca kṛtsnaśas
pura anta dvyaṇuka ādyānām saṃpūrṇe kalpa saṃkṣaye

original: upasthite mahāghore hyapratyakṣe tu kasyacit // BndP_3,3.3 //
analyzed: upasthite mahā ghore hi apratyakṣe tu kasyacid
ante drumasya saṃprāpte paścimā asya manoḥ tadā

original: ante kaliyuge tasminkṣīṇe saṃhāra ucyate // BndP_3,3.4 //
analyzed: ante kali yuge tasmin kṣīṇe saṃhāraḥ ucyate
saṃprakṣāle tadā vṛtte pratyāhāre hi upasthite
pratyāhāre tadā tasmin bhūta tanmātra saṃkṣaye
mahat ādi vikārasya viśeṣa antasya saṃkṣaye
svabhāva kārite tasmin pravṛtte pratisaṃcare

original: āpo grasaṃti vai pūrvaṃ bhūmergandhātmakaṃ gumam /
analyzed: āpaḥ grasaṃti vai pūrvam bhūmeḥ gandha ātmakam

original: āttagandhā tato bhūmiḥ pralayatvāya kalpate // BndP_3,3.7 //
analyzed: ātta gandhā tatas bhūmiḥ pralaya tvāya kalpate
praṇaṣṭe gandha tanmātre toya avasthāḥ dharā bhavet
āpaḥ tadā praviṣṭāḥ tu vegavatyaḥ mahā svanāḥ
sarvam āpūrayitvā idam tiṣṭhanti vicaranti ca

original: apāmapi gaṇo yastu jyotiḥṣvālīyate rasaḥ // BndP_3,3.9 //
analyzed: apām api gaṇaḥ yaḥ tu jyotiḥṣu ālīyate rasaḥ
naśyanti āpaḥ tadā tatra rasa tanmātra saṃkṣayāt
tīvra tejaḥ hṛta rasā jyotiṣṭvam prāpnuvanti uta
graste ca salile tejaḥ sarvatomukham īkṣate

original: athāgniḥ sarvato vyāpta ādatte tajjalaṃ tadā // BndP_3,3.11 //
analyzed: atha agniḥ sarvatas vyāptaḥ ādatte tat jalam tadā
sarvam āpūryate rcirbhiḥ tadā jagat idam śanais
arcirbhiḥ saṃtate tasmin taryak ūrdhvam adhas tatas
jyotiṣaḥ u pi guṇam rūpam vāyuḥ atti prakāśakam
pralīyate tadā tasmin dīpa arciḥ iva mārute
pranaṣṭe rūpa tanmātre hṛta rūpaḥ vibhāvasuḥ
upaśāmyati tejaḥ hi vāyuḥ ādhūyate mahān

original: nirāloke tadā loke vāyubhūte ca tejasi /
analyzed: nirāloke tadā loke vāyu bhūte ca tejasi
tatas tu mūlam āsādya vāyuḥ saṃbandham ātmanaḥ
ūrdhvañca adhas ca tiryak ca dodhavīti diśaḥ daśa

original: vāyorapi guṇaṃ sparśamākāśaṃ grasate ca tat // BndP_3,3.16 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ api guṇam sparśam ākāśam grasate ca tat
praśāmyati tadā vāyuḥ tiṣṭhati anāvṛtam
arūpam arasa sparśam agandham na ca mūrtimat
sarvam āpūrayat śabdaiḥ su mahat tat prakāśate
tasmin līne tadā śiṣṭam ākāśam śabda lakṣaṇam
śabda mātram tat ākāśam sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati

original: tatra śabdaṃ gumaṃ tasya bhūtadirgrasate punaḥ // BndP_3,3.19 //
analyzed: tatra śabdam tasya bhūtadiḥ grasate punar
bhūta indriyeṣu yugapad bhūta ādau saṃsthiteṣu vai
abhimāna ātmakaḥ hi eṣa bhūtādiḥ tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ
bhūtādiḥ grasate ca api mahān vai buddhi lakṣaṇaḥ

original: mahānātmā tu vijñeyaḥ saṃkalpo vyavasāyakaḥ // BndP_3,3.21 //
analyzed: mahān ātmā tu vijñeyaḥ saṃkalpaḥ vyavasāyakaḥ

original: buddhirmanaśca liṅgaṃ ca mahānakṣara eva ca /
analyzed: buddhiḥ manaḥ ca liṅgam ca mahān akṣaraḥ eva ca
paryāya vācakaiḥ śabdaiḥ tam āhuḥ tattva cintakāḥ
saṃpralīneṣu bhūteṣu guṇa sāmye tatas mahān
līyante guṇa sāmyam tu sva ātmani eva avatiṣṭhate
līyante sarva bhūtānām kāraṇāni prasaṃgame

original: ityeṣa saṃyamaścaiva tattvānāṃ kāraṇaiḥ saha // BndP_3,3.24 //
analyzed: iti eṣa saṃyamaḥ ca eva tattvānām kāraṇaiḥ saha
tattva prasaṃyamaḥ hi eṣa smṛtaḥ hi āvartakaḥ dvijāḥ

original: dharmādharmauṃ tapo jñānaṃ śubhaṃ satyānṛte tathā // BndP_3,3.25 //
analyzed: dharma adharmaum tapaḥ jñānam śubham satya anṛte tathā
ūrdhva bhāvaḥ hi adhas bhāvaḥ sukha duḥkhe priya apriye
sarvam etat prapañca stham guṇa mātra ātmakam smṛtam

original: prakṛtyāṃ caiva tatsarvaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ pratiṣṭhati // BndP_3,3.27 //
analyzed: prakṛtyām ca eva tat sarvam puṇyam pāpam pratiṣṭhati

original: yātyavasthā tu sācaiva dehināṃ tu nirucyate /
analyzed: yā ati avasthā tu sā ca eva dehinām tu nirucyate

original: jantūnāṃ pāpapuṇyaṃ tu prakṛtau yatpratiṣṭhitam // BndP_3,3.28 //
analyzed: jantūnām pāpa puṇyam tu prakṛtau yat pratiṣṭhitam
avasthā sthāni tāni eva puṇya pāpāni jantavaḥ
yojayante punar dehān para tvena tathā eva ca
dharma adharmaum tu jantūnām guṇa mātra ātmakau ubhau

original: kāraṇaiḥ svaiḥ pracīyete kāyatveneha jantubhiḥ // BndP_3,3.30 //
analyzed: kāraṇaiḥ svaiḥ pracīyete kāya tvena iha jantubhiḥ
sa cetanāḥ pralīyante kṣetrajña dhiṣṭhitāḥ guṇāḥ

original: sarge ca pratisarge ca saṃsāre caiva jantavaḥ // BndP_3,3.31 //
analyzed: sarge ca pratisarge ca saṃsāre ca eva jantavaḥ
saṃyujyante viyujyante kāraṇaiḥ saṃcaranti ca

original: rājasī tāmasī caiva sāttvikī caiva vṛttayaḥ // BndP_3,3.32 //
analyzed: rājasī tāmasī ca eva sāttvikī ca eva vṛttayaḥ
guṇa mātrāḥ pravartante puruṣa dhiṣṭha tāḥ stridhā
urddhva deśa ātmakam sattvam adhobhāga ātmakam tamaḥ
tayoḥ pravarttakam madhye iha eva āvarttakam rajaḥ
iti evam parivartante trayaḥ cetaḥ guṇa ātmakāḥ
lokeṣu sarva bhūtānām tat na kāryam vijānatā
avidyā pratyaya āraṃbhāḥ ārabhyante hi mānavaiḥ
etāḥ tu gatayaḥ tisraḥ śubhāt pāpa ātmikāḥ smṛtāḥ
tamasaḥ bhibhavāt jantuḥ yāthātathyam na vindati
a tattva darśanāt saḥ tha vividham vadhyate tatas

original: prākṛtena ca bandhena tathyāvaikārikeṇa ca // BndP_3,3.37 //
analyzed: prākṛtena ca bandhena tathya avaikārikeṇa ca

original: ityete vai trayaḥ proktā bandhā hyajñānahetukāḥ // BndP_3,3.38 //
analyzed: iti ete vai trayaḥ proktāḥ bandhāḥ hi ajñāna hetukāḥ

original: anitye nityasaṃjñā ca duḥkhe ca sukhadarśanam /
analyzed: anitye nitya saṃjñā ca duḥkhe ca sukha darśanam

original: asve svamiti ca jñānamaśucau śuciniścayaḥ // BndP_3,3.39 //
analyzed: asve svam iti ca jñānam aśucau śuci niścayaḥ
yeṣām ete manaḥ doṣāḥ jñāna doṣāḥ viparyayāt
rāga dveṣa nivṛttiḥ ca tat jñānam samudāhṛtam
ajñānam tamasaḥ mūram karma dvaya phalam rajaḥ

original: karma jastu punardeho mahāduḥkhaṃ pravarttate // BndP_3,3.41 //
analyzed: punar dehaḥ mahā duḥkham pravarttate
śrotra jā netra jā ca eva tvac jihvā ghrāṇa jā tathā
punarbhava karī duḥkhāt karmaṇā jāyate tṛṣā
sa tṛṣṇaḥ bhihitaḥ bālaḥ sva kṛtaiḥ karmaṇaḥ phalaiḥ
taila vīḍaka vat jīvaḥ tatra eva parivarttate

original: taṃ śatrumavadhāryaikaṃ jñāne yatnaṃ samācaret // BndP_3,3.44 //
analyzed: tam śatrum avadhārya ekam jñāne yatnam samācaret

original: vairāgyācchudhyate cāpi śuddhaḥ sattvena mucyate // BndP_3,3.45 //
analyzed: vairāgyāt śudhyate ca api śuddhaḥ sattvena mucyate
atas ūrddhvam pravakṣyāmi rāgam bhūta apahāriṇam
abhiṣvaṅgāya yogaḥ syāt viṣayeṣu avaśa ātmanaḥ
aniṣṭam iṣṭam aprīti prīti tāpa viṣādanam

original: duḥkhalābhe na tāpaśca sukhānusmaraṇaṃ tathā // BndP_3,3.47 //

original: ityeṣa vaiṣayo rāgaḥ saṃbhūtyāḥ kāraṇaṃ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: iti eṣa vaiṣayaḥ rāgaḥ saṃbhūtyāḥ kāraṇam smṛtaḥ

original: yasya cārṣe na pramāṇaṃ śiṣṭācāraṃ tathaiva ca // BndP_3,3.49 //
analyzed: yasya ca ārṣe na pramāṇam śiṣṭa ācāram tathā eva ca

original: eṣa mārgo hi niraye tiryyagyonau ca kāraṇam // BndP_3,3.50 //
analyzed: eṣa mārgaḥ hi niraye tiryyagyonau ca kāraṇam

original: trividho yātanāsthāne tiryyagyonau ca ṣaḍvidhe // BndP_3,3.51 //
analyzed: trividhaḥ yātanā sthāne tiryyagyonau ca ṣaḍvidhe
kāraṇe viṣaye ca eva pratighātaḥ tu sarvaśas

original: anaiśvaryaṃ tu tatsarvaṃ pratighātātmakaṃ smṛtam // BndP_3,3.52 //
analyzed: anaiśvaryam tu tat sarvam pratighāta ātmakam smṛtam
iti eṣā tāmasī vṛttiḥ bhūta ādīnām caturvidhā

original: tattvānāṃ ca yathātattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai tattvadarśanāt /
analyzed: tattvānām ca yathātattvam dṛṣṭvā vai tattva darśanāt
sattva kṣetrajña nānātvam etat nānā artha darśanam

original: tena baddhasya vai bandho mokṣo muktasya tena ca // BndP_3,3.55 //
analyzed: tena baddhasya vai bandhaḥ mokṣaḥ muktasya tena ca

original: saṃsāre vinivṛtte tu mukto liṅgena mucyate /
analyzed: saṃsāre vinivṛtte tu muktaḥ liṅgena mucyate
niḥsaṃbandhaḥ hi acaitanyaḥ sva ātmani eva avatiṣṭhate

original: sa cāpi trividhaḥ prokto mokṣo vai tattvadarśibhiḥ /

original: pūrvaṃ viyogo jñānena dvitīye rāgasaṃkṣayāt // BndP_3,3.58 //
analyzed: pūrvam viyogaḥ jñānena dvitīye rāga saṃkṣayāt

original: ata ūrddhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi vairāgyaṃ doṣadarśanāt // BndP_3,3.60 //

original: divye ca mānuṣe caiva viṣaye pañcalakṣaṇe /
analyzed: divye ca mānuṣe ca eva viṣaye pañca lakṣaṇe
a pradveṣaḥ na abhiṣvaṅgaḥ karttavyaḥ doṣa darśanāt
tapa prīti viṣādānām kāryam tu parivarjanam

original: evaṃ vairāgyamāsthāya śarīrī nirmamo bhavet // BndP_3,3.62 //
analyzed: evam vairāgyam āsthāya śarīrī nirmamaḥ bhavet
anityam aśivam duḥkham iti vuddhyā anucintya ca
viśuddham kārya karaṇam sattvasya ati niṣaivayā
paripakva kaṣāyaḥ hi kṛtsnān doṣān prapaśyati
tatas prayāṇa kāle hi doṣaiḥ naimittikaiḥ tathā
ūṣmā prakupitaḥ kāye tīvra vāyu samīritaḥ
sa śarīram upāśritya kṛtsnān doṣān ruṇaddhi vai
prāṇakthānāni bhindan hi chindan marmāṇi atītya ca
śaityāt prakupitaḥ vāyuḥ ūrddhvam tu utkramate tatas

original: samāsātsaṃvṛte jñāne saṃcṛtteṣu ca karmasu // BndP_3,3.67 //
analyzed: samāsāt saṃvṛte jñāne saṃcṛtteṣu ca karmasu

original: sa jīvo nābhyadhiṣṭhānaḥ karmabhiḥ svaiḥ purākṛtaiḥ /
analyzed: sa jīvaḥ na abhyadhiṣṭhānaḥ karmabhiḥ svaiḥ purā kṛtaiḥ

original: aṣṭāṅgapraṇavṛttiṃ vai sa vicyāvayate punaḥ // BndP_3,3.68 //
analyzed: vai sa vicyāvayate punar

original: evaṃ prāṇaiḥ parityakto mṛta ityabhidhīyate // BndP_3,3.69 //
analyzed: evam prāṇaiḥ parityaktaḥ mṛtaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: rañjanaṃ tadvidheyasya te tānyo na ca vidyate // BndP_3,3.70 //
analyzed: rañjanam tad vidheyasya te tān yaḥ na ca vidyate

a pradveṣaḥ na abhiṣvaṅgaḥ prīti tāpa vivarjanam

original: vairāgyakāraṇaṃ hyete prakṛtīnāṃ layasya ca // BndP_3,3.72 //
analyzed: vairāgya kāraṇam hi ete prakṛtīnām layasya ca

original: aṣṭau prakṛtayo jñeyāḥ pūrvoktā vai yathākramam /
analyzed: aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ jñeyāḥ pūrva uktāḥ vai yathākramam
avyakta ādyāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ bhūta antāḥ prakṛteḥ bhavāḥ

varṇa āśramāṇām dharmaḥ yam deva sthāneṣu kāraṇam
brahma ādīni piśāca antāni aṣṭau sthānāni devatā
aiśvaryam āṇima ādyam hi kāraṇam hi aṣṭa lakṣaṇam

aṣṭāv etāni rūpāṇi prākṛtāni yathākramam
kṣetrajñeṣu anusajjante guṇa mātra tmakāni tu
prāvṛṣ kāle pṛthak megham paśyanti iva sa cakṣuṣaḥ

original: paśyantyevaṃ vidhāḥ siddhā jīvaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: paśyanti evam vidhāḥ siddhāḥ jīvam divyena cakṣuṣā
khādataḥ ca anna pānāni yonīḥ praviśataḥ tathā

original: jīvaḥ prāṇastathā liṅgaṃ karaṇaṃ ca catuṣṭayam // BndP_3,3.79 //
analyzed: jīvaḥ prāṇaḥ tathā liṅgam karaṇam ca catuṣṭayam

original: vyaktāvyaktapramāṇo 'yaṃ sa vai bhuṅkte tu kṛtsnaśaḥ // BndP_3,3.80 //
analyzed: vyakta avyakta pramāṇaḥ yam sa vai bhuṅkte tu kṛtsnaśas

original: evaṃ jñātvā śucirbhūtvā jñānādvai vipramucyate // BndP_3,3.81 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā śuciḥ bhūtvā jñānāt vai vipramucyate

original: naṣṭaṃ caiva yathā tattvaṃ tattvānāṃ tattvadarśane /
analyzed: naṣṭam ca eva yathā tattvam tattvānām tattva darśane

taruṇa āditya saṅkāśā jvalat kāñcī taraṅgiṇī
sañcacāla haya ārūḍhā nartayantī iva vājinam
atha śrī daṇḍanāthāyāḥ niryāṇa paṭaha dhvaniḥ
uddaṇḍa sindhu nisvānaḥ cakāra badhiram jagat
vajra bāṇaiḥ kaṭhoraiḥ ca bhindantyaḥ kakubhaḥ daśa
anyuddhata bhuja aśmānaḥ śaktayaḥ kāścid ucchritāḥ
kāścid śrī daṇḍanāthāyāḥ

atyanta sainya sambādham vetra saṃtāḍanaiḥ śataiḥ

siha aṅkāḥ ca eva bibhrāṇāḥ śaktayaḥ vyacalan purā

sphurat karāḥ pracalitāḥ śaktayaḥ kāścid ādaduḥ

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastyasaṃvāde lalitopākhyāne sasenavijayayātrā nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ

daṇḍanāthā viniryāṇe saṃkhyā atītaiḥ sita prabhaiḥ

dadṛśe ghanuṣaḥ cakram kevalam śara dhāraṇe
āśu arka abara saṃparka sphuṭa pratiphalat phalāḥ
śarāḥ sampad karī cāpa cyutāḥ samadahan arīn
durmadasya atha tasyāḥ ca samabhūt yuddham uddhatam
abhūt anyonya saṃghaṭṭāt visphuliṅga śilīmukhaiḥ
prathamam prasṛtaiḥ bāṇaiḥ sampad devī suradviṣoḥ
andhakāraḥ samabhavat tiraskurvan ahaskaram
tad antare ca bāṇānām ati saṃghaṭṭa yonayaḥ
viṣphuliṅgāḥ vidadhire dadhire bhrama cāturīm
tayā adhirūḍhaḥ saṃ śroṇyā araṇa kolāhalaḥ karī
parākramam bahuvidham darśayāmāsa saṃgare
kareṇa katicid daityān pāda ghātena kāṃścana
udagra danta musala ghātaiḥ anyān ca dānavān
vāla kāṇḍa hataiḥ anyān phetkāraiḥ aparān ripūn
gātra vyāmarddanaiḥ anyān nakha ghātaiḥ tathā aparān
pṛthu māna abhighātena kāṃścid daityān vyamardayat
caturam caritam cakre saṃpad devī mataṅga jaḥ
su durmadaḥ krudhā raktaḥ dṛḍhena ekena patriṇā
saṃpad karī mukuṭa gam maṇim ekam apāharat
atha krodha aruṇa dṛśā tayā muktaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ

original: vikṣato vakṣasi kṣipraṃ durmado jīvitaṃ jahau // BndP_3,22.64 //
analyzed: vikṣataḥ vakṣasi kṣipram durmadaḥ jīvitam jahau
tatas kilakilā rāvam kṛtvā śakti camū varaiḥ
tad sainika varāḥ tu anye nihatāḥ dānava uttamāḥ
hata avaśiṣṭāḥ daityāḥ tu śakti bāṇaiḥ khilīkṛtāḥ
palāyitāḥ raṇa kṣoṇyāḥ śūnyakam puram āśrayan
tad vṛttāntam atha ākarṇya saṃkruddhaḥ dānava īśvaraḥ
pracaṇḍena prabhāveṇa dīpyamānaḥ iva ātmani
sa pasparśa niyuddhāya khaḍgam ugra vilocanaḥ
kuṭila akṣam nikaṭa gam babhāṣe pṛtanāpatim
katham sā duṣṭa vanitā durmadam bala śālinam

original: nipātitavatī yuddhe kaṣṭa eva vidheḥ kramaḥ // BndP_3,22.69 //
analyzed: nipātitavatī yuddhe kaṣṭaḥ eva vidheḥ kramaḥ

original: na sureṣu na yakṣeṣu noragendreṣu yadbalam /
analyzed: na sureṣu na yakṣeṣu na uraga indreṣu yat balam
abhūt pratihatam saḥ pi durmadaḥ balayā hataḥ

original: tāṃ duṣṭavanitāṃ jetumākraṣṭuṃ ca kacaṃ haṭhāt /
analyzed: tām duṣṭa vanitām jetum ākraṣṭum ca kacam haṭhāt
senāpatim kuraṇḍa ākhyam preṣaya āhava durmadam
eti saṃproṣitaḥ tena kuṭilākṣaḥ mahā palam
kuraṇḍam caṇḍa dos daṇḍam ājuhāva prabhoḥ puras
sa kuraṇḍaḥ samāgatya praṇāma svāmine diśat

original: uvāca kuṭilākṣastaṃ gaccha sajjaya sainikān // BndP_3,22.73 //
analyzed: uvāca kuṭila akṣaḥ tam gaccha sajjaya sainikān
māyāyām si tvam citra yuddha viśārada

original: kūṭayuddhe ca nipuṇastāṃ striyaṃ parimardaya // BndP_3,22.74 //
analyzed: kūṭa yuddhe ca nipuṇaḥ tām striyam parimardaya
iti svāmi puraḥ tena kuṭilākṣeṇa deśitaḥ
nirjagāma purāt tūrṇam kuraṇḍaḥ caṇḍa vikramaḥ
viṃśati akṣauhiṇībhiḥ ca samantāt parivāritaḥ
mardayan sa mahī golam hasti vāji padātibhiḥ
durmadasya agrajaḥ caṇḍaḥ kuraṇḍaḥ samaram yayau
dūlībhiḥ tumulīkurvan digantam dhīra mānasaḥ
śoka roṣa graha grastaḥ javana aśva gataḥ yayau
śārṅgam dhanuḥ samādāya ghora ṭaṅkāram utsvanam
vavarṣa śara dhārabhiḥ saṃpatkaryā mahā camūm
pāpe mad anujam hatvā durmadam yuddha durmadam
vṛthā vahasi vikrānti lava leśam mahā madam
idānīm ca eva bhavatīm etaiḥ nārāca maṇḍalaiḥ

original: antakasya purīmatra prāpayiṣyāmi paśya mām // BndP_3,22.80 //
analyzed: antakasya purīm atra prāpayiṣyāmi paśya mām
ati hṛdyam ati svādu tvad vapuḥ bila nirgatam
apūrvam aṅganā raktam pibantu raṇa pūtanāḥ
mama anuja vadha utthasya pratyavāyasya tat phalam

original: adhunā bhokṣyase duṣṭe paśya me bhujayorbalam // BndP_3,22.82 //
analyzed: adhunā bhokṣyase duṣṭe paśya me bhujayoḥ balam
iti saṃtarjayan saṃpad karīm kari vara sthitām
sainyam protsāhayāmāsa śakti senā vimardane

original: atha tāṃ pṛtanāṃ caṇḍī kuraṇḍasya mahaujasaḥ /
analyzed: atha tām pṛtanām caṇḍī kuraṇḍasya mahā ojasaḥ
vimardayitum udyuktā sva sainyam prodasīsahat
apurva āhava saṃjāta kautukā atha jagāda tām
aśva rūḍhā samāgatya sa sneha ārdram idam vacaḥ

original: sakhi saṃpatkari prītyā mama vāṇī niśamyatam /
analyzed: sakhi saṃpatkari prītyā mama vāṇī

original: asya yuddhamidaṃ dehi mama kartuṃ guṇottaram // BndP_3,22.86 //
analyzed: asya yuddham idam dehi mama kartum guṇa uttaram
kṣaṇam sahasva samare mayā eva eṣa niyotsyate
yācitā asi sakhi tvena na atra saṃśayam ācara

original: iti tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā saṃpaddevyā śucismitā /
analyzed: iti tasyāḥ vacaḥ śrutvā saṃpad devyā śuci smitā
nivartayāmāsa camūm kuruṇḍa abhimukha utthitām
atha bāla arka varṇābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ samadhiṣṭhitāḥ
taraṅgāḥ iva sainya abdheḥ turaṅgāḥ vāta raṃhasaḥ
kharaiḥ khura puṭaiḥ kṣoṇīm ullikhantaḥ muhur muhur
petuḥ eka pravāheṇa kuraṇḍasya camū mukhe
valgā vibhāga kṛtyeṣu saṃvartana vivartane
ghati bhedeṣu cāreṣu pañcadhā khura pātane
protsāhane ca saṃjñābhiḥ kara pāda agra yonibhiḥ
caturābhiḥ turaṅgasya hṛdaya jñābhiḥ āhave
aśva ārūḍha aṃbikā sainya śaktibhiḥ saha dānavāḥ
protsāhitāḥ kuraṇḍena samayudhyanta durmadāḥ

original: evaṃ pravṛtte samare śaktīnāṃ ca suradviṣām /
analyzed: evam pravṛtte samare śaktīnām ca suradviṣām
aparājita nāmānam hayam āruhya veginam
abhyadravat durācāram aśva ārūḍhāḥ kuraṇḍakam
pracalat veṇi subhagā śarad candra kalā ujjvalā
saṃdhyā anurakta śītāṃśu maṇḍalī suṃdara ānanā
smayamānā iva samare gṛhīta maṇi kārmukā
avākirat śara āsāraiḥ kuraṇḍam turaga ānanā
turaga ārūḍhayā utkṣiptāḥ samākrāman digantarān

original: diśo daśa vyānaśire rukmapuṅkhāḥ śilīmukhāḥ // BndP_3,22.97 //
analyzed: diśaḥ daśa vyānaśire rukma puṅkhāḥ śilīmukhāḥ
durmadasya agrajaḥ kruddhaḥ kuraṇḍaḥ caṇḍa vikramaḥ
viśikhaiḥ śārṅga niṣṭhyūtaiḥ aśva ārūḍhā mavākirat
caṇḍaiḥ khura puṭaiḥ sainyam khaṇḍayan ati vegataḥ
aśva ārūḍha aturaṅgaḥ mardayāmāsa dānavān
tasyāḥ heṣā ravāt dūram utpāta aṃbudhi niḥsvanaḥ
amūrcchayan anekāni tasya ānītāni vairiṇaḥ
itas tatas pracalitaiḥ daitya cakre haya āsanā

original: nijaṃ pāśāyudhaṃ divyaṃ mumoca jvalitākṛti // BndP_3,22.101 //
analyzed: nijam pāśa āyudham divyam mumoca jvalita ākṛti
tasmāt pāśāt koṭiśas nye pāśāḥ bhujaga bhīṣaṇāḥ
samastam api tat sainyam baddhvā a baddhvā vyamūrchayan

original: tha sainikabandhena kruddhaḥ sa ca kuraṇḍakaḥ /
analyzed: sainika bandhena kruddhaḥ sa ca kuraṇḍakaḥ
sareṇa ekena ciccheda tasyāḥ maṇi dhanuḥ guṇam
chinnam aurvi dhanuḥ tyaktvā bhṛśam kruddhā haya āsanā

original: aṅkuśaṃ pātayāmāsa tasya vakṣasi durmateḥ // BndP_3,22.104 //
analyzed: aṅkuśam pātayāmāsa tasya vakṣasi durmateḥ
tena aṅkuśena jvalatā pīta jīvita śoṇitaḥ

original: kuraṇḍo nyapatadbhūmau vajrarugṇa iva drumaḥ // BndP_3,22.105 //
analyzed: kuraṇḍaḥ nyapatat bhūmau vajra rugṇaḥ iva drumaḥ
tad aṅkuśa viniṣṭhyūtāḥ putanāḥ kāścid udbhaṭāḥ

original: tatsainyaṃ pāśaniṣyandaṃ bhakṣayitvā kṣayaṃ gatāḥ // BndP_3,22.106 //
analyzed: tat sainyam pāśa nisyandam bhakṣayitvā kṣayam gatāḥ
ittham kuruṇḍe nihate viṃśati akṣauhiṇī patau

original: hatāvaśiṣṭāste daityāḥ prapalāyanta vai drutam // BndP_3,22.107 //
analyzed: hata avaśiṣṭāḥ te daityāḥ prapalāyanta vai drutam
kuraṇḍam sa anujam yuddhe śakti sainyaiḥ nipātitam
śrutvā niśaśvāsa bhujaṅga vat

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍamahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastyasaṃvāde lalitopākhyāne durmadakuraṇḍavadho nāma dvāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍa mahāpurāṇe uttara bhāge hayagrīva agastya saṃvāde lalitā upākhyāne durmadakuraṇḍavadhaḥ nāma dvāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha aśva rūḍhayā kṣipte kuraṇḍe bhaṇḍa dānavaḥ
kuṭilākṣam idam proce punar eva yuyutsayā

original: svapne 'pi yanna saṃbhāvyaṃ yanna śrutamitaḥ purā /
analyzed: svapne pi yat na saṃbhāvyam yat na śrutam itas purā

original: yacca no śaṅkitaṃ citte tadetatkaṣṭamāgatam // BndP_3,23.2 //
analyzed: yat ca no śaṅkitam citte tat etat kaṣṭam āgatam
kuraṇḍa durmadau sattva śālinau bhrātarau hitau
duṣṭa dāsyāḥ prabhāvaḥ yam māyāvinyāḥ mahattaraḥ
itas param karaṅka ādīn pañca senā adhināyakān
śatam akṣauhiṇīnām ca prasthāpaya raṇa aṅgaṇe
te yuddha durmadāḥ śūrāḥ saṃgrāmeṣu tanutyajaḥ
sarvathā eva vijeṣyante durvidagdha vilāsinīm
iti bhaṇḍa vacaḥ śrutvā bhṛśam catvarayā anvitaḥ
kuṭilākṣaḥ karaṅka ādīn ājuhāva camūpatīn
te svāminam namaskṛtya kuṭilākṣeṇa deśitāḥ

original: agnau praviṣṇava iva krodhāndhā niryayuḥ purāt // BndP_3,23.7 //
analyzed: agnau praviṣṇavaḥ iva krodha andhāḥ niryayuḥ purāt
teṣām prayāṇa niḥsāṇa raṇitam bhṛśa duḥsaham
ākarṇya diggajāḥ tūrṇam śīrṇa karṇāḥ jughūrṇire
śatam akṣauhiṇīnām ca prācalat ketumālakam
uttaraṅga turaṅga ādi babhau matta mataṅga jam
hreṣamāṇa haya ākīrṇam krandat bhaṭa kula udbhavam
bṛṃhamāṇa gajam garjat ratha yakram cacāla tat
cakranemi hata kṣoṇī reṇu kṣapita rociṣā
babhūve tuhina āsāra channena iva vivasvatā
dhūlī mayam iva aśeṣam abhavat viśva maṇḍalam
kvacid śabda mayam ca eva niḥsāṇa kaṭhina svanaiḥ
udbhūtaiḥ dhūlikā jālaiḥ ākrāntāḥ daitya sainikāḥ
iyat tayā atas senāyāḥ saṃkhyā api paribhāvitā
dhvajāḥ bahuvidha ākārāḥ mīna vyāla ādi citritāḥ
praceluḥ dhūlikā jāle matsyāḥ iva mahā udadhau
tān āpatataḥ ālokya lalitā sainikam prati
vitresuḥ amarāḥ sarve śaktīnām bhaṅga śaṅkayā
te karaṅka mukhāḥ pañca senāpatayaḥ uddhatāḥ

original: sarpiṇīṃ nāma samare māyāṃ cakrurmahīyasīm // BndP_3,23.16 //
analyzed: sarpiṇīm nāma samare māyām cakruḥ mahīyasīm
taiḥ samutpatitā duṣṭā sarpiṇī ramaśāṃbarī
mahodadhiḥ iva atyantam gaṃbhīra kuhara udarī
puras cacāla śaktīn āntrāsayantī manaḥ raṇe
kadrūḥ iva aparā duṣṭā bahu sarpa vibhūṣaṇā
sarpāṇām udbhava sthānam māyā maya śarīriṇām
senāpatīnām nāsīre vellayantī mahī tale
vellitam bahudhā cakre ghora ārāva virāviṇī
tathā eva māyayā pūrvam te suredrāḥ vyajījayan
karaṅka ādyāḥ durātmānaḥ pañca pañcattva kāmukāḥ
atha pravavṛte yuddham śaktīnām amara druhām
anyonya vīra bhāṣābhiḥ protsāhita ghana krudhām
atyanta saṃkula tayā na vijñāta parasparāḥ
śaktayaḥ dānavaḥ ca eva prajahuḥ śastra pāṇayaḥ
anyonya śastra saṃghaṭṭa samutthita hutāśane
pravṛtta viśikha srotaḥ pracchanna harit antare
bahu rakta nadīpūra hriyamāṇa mataṅga je
māṃsa kardama nirmagna niṣpanda ratha maṇḍale
vikīrṇa keśa śaivāla vilasat rakta nirjhare
ati niṣṭhura vidhvaṃsi siṃhanāda bhayaṅkare
rajaḥ mule rākṣasī tṛpti dāyini
pravṛtte ghora saṃgrāme śaktīnām ca suradviṣām
atha sva balam ādāya pañcabhiḥ preritā satī
sarpiṇī bahudhā sarpān visasarja śarīrataḥ
takṣa karkeṭaka samāḥ vāsuki pramukha tviṣaḥ
nānāvidha vapuḥ varṇāḥ nānā dṛṣṭi bhayaṅkarāḥ
nānāvidha viṣa jvālā nirdagdha bhuvana trayāḥ
dāradam vatsanābham ca kālakūṭam atha aparam
saurāṣṭram ca viṣam ghoram brahmaputram atha aparam
pratipannam śauklikeyam anyāni api viṣāṇi ca
vyālaiḥ svakīya vadanaiḥ vilola rasanā dvayaiḥ
vikirantaḥ śakti sainye visamruḥ sarpiṇī tanoḥ
dhūmra varṇāḥ dvi vadanā sarpāḥ ati bhayaṅkarāḥ
nayana dvandvāt krodha dīpitāḥ
pīta varṇāḥ triphaṇakāḥ daṃṣṭrābhiḥ vikaṭa ānanāḥ
sarpiṇyāḥ karṇa kuharāt utthitāḥ sarpa koṭayaḥ
agre pucche ca vadanam dhārayantaḥ phaṇa anvitam
āsya ādāḥ nīla vapuṣaḥ sarpiṇyāḥ phaṇinaḥ bhavan
anyaiḥ ca bala varṇāḥ ca catur vaktrāḥ catuṣpadāḥ
nāsikā vivarāt tasyāḥ udgatāḥ ugra rociṣaḥ
laṃbamāna mahā carma āvṛtta sthūla payodharāt
nābhikuṇḍāt ca bahavaḥ rakta varṇāḥ bhayānakāḥ
halāhalam vahantaḥ ca protthitāḥ pannaga adhipāḥ
vidaśantaḥ śakti senām dahantaḥ viṣa vahnibhiḥ
badhnantaḥ bhoga pāśaiḥ ca nighnantaḥ phaṇa maṇḍalaiḥ
atyantam ākulām cakruḥ lalitā īśī camūm amī

original: khaṇḍyamānā api muhuḥ śaktīnāṃ śastrakoṭibhiḥ // BndP_3,23.40 //
analyzed: khaṇḍyamānāḥ api muhur śaktīnām śastra koṭibhiḥ
upari upari vardhante sapiṇḍa pravisarpiṇaḥ

original: naśyanti bahavaḥ sarpā jāyante cāpare punaḥ // BndP_3,23.41 //
analyzed: naśyanti bahavaḥ sarpāḥ jāyante ca apare punar
ekasya nāśa samaye bahavaḥ nye samutthitāḥ

original: mūlabhūtā yato duṣṭā sarpiṇī na vinaśyati // BndP_3,23.42 //
analyzed: mūla bhūtā yatas duṣṭā sarpiṇī na vinaśyati
atas tad kṛta sarpāṇām nāśe sarpa antara udbhavaḥ
tatas ca śakti sainyānām śarīrāṇi viṣa analaiḥ
dahyamānāni duḥkhena viplutāni abhavan raṇe
kiṅkartavya vimūḍheṣu śakti cakreṣu bhogibhiḥ
parākramam bahuvidham cakruḥ te pañca dānavāḥ
karīndrī gardabha śataiḥ yuktam syandanam āsthitaḥ
cakreṇa tīkṣṇa dhāreṇa śakti senām amardayat
vajradanta abhidhaḥ ca anyaḥ bhaṇḍa daitya camūpatiḥ
vajra bāṇa abhighātena ha uṣṭrataḥ hi raṇam vyadhāt
atha vajramukhaḥ ca eva cakrivantam mahattaram
āruhya kunta dhārābhiḥ śakti cakram amardayat
vajradanta abhidhānaḥ nyaḥ camūnām adhipaḥ balī
gṛdhra yugma ratha ārūḍhaḥ prajahāra śilīmukhaiḥ
taiḥ senāpatibhiḥ duṣṭaiḥ protsāhitam atha āhave
śatam akṣauhiṇīnām ca nipapāta eka helayā
sarpiṇī ca durācārā bahu māyā parigrahā
kṣaṇekṣaṇe koṭi saṃkhyān visasarja phaṇādharān
tathā vikalitam sainyam avalokya ruṣā ākulā
nakulī garuḍa ārūḍhā sā papāta raṇa ajire
pratapta kanaka prakhyā lalitā tālu sambhavā
samasta vāc maya ākārā dantaiḥ vajra mayaiḥ yutā

original: sarpiṇyabhimukhaṃ tatra visasarja nijaṃ balam // BndP_3,23.53 //
analyzed: sarpiṇī abhimukham tatra visasarja nijam balam
tayā adhiṣṭhita tuṅga aṃsaḥ pakṣa vikṣipta bhūdharaḥ
garuḍaḥ prācalat yuddhe sumeruḥ iva jaṅgamaḥ
sarpiṇī māyayā jātān sarpān dṛṣṭvā bhayānakān

original: krodharaktekṣaṇaṃ vyāttaṃ nakulī vidadhe mukham // BndP_3,23.55 //
analyzed: krodha rakta īkṣaṇam vyāttam nakulī vidadhe mukham
atha śrī nakulī devyāḥ dvātriṃśat danta koṭayaḥ
dvātriṃśat koṭayaḥ jātāḥ nakulāḥ kanaka prabhāḥ
itas tatas khaṇḍayantaḥ sarpiṇī sarpa maṇḍalam
nija daṃṣṭrā vimardena nāśayantaḥ ca tat viṣam
vyabhraman samare ghore viṣa ghnāḥ svarṇa babhravaḥ
utkarṇāḥ krodha samparkāt hūnita aśeṣa lomakāḥ
utphullāḥ nakulāḥ vyātta vadanāḥ vyadaśan ahīn
ekaikam āyā sarpasya babhruḥ ekaikaḥ udgataḥ
tīkṣṇa danta nipātena khaṇḍayāmāsa vigraham
bhogi bhoga sṛtaiḥ raktaiḥ sṛkkiṇī śoṇa tām gate
lihantaḥ nakulāḥ jihvā pallavaiḥ pupluvuḥ mṛdhe
nakulaiḥ daśyamānānām atyanta caṭulam vapuḥ
muhur kuṇḍalitaiḥ bhogaiḥ pannagānām vyaceṣṭata
nakula āvali daṣṭānām naṣṭa asūnām phaṇābhṛtām
phaṇa ābhara samutkīrṇāḥ maṇayaḥ vyarucan raṇe
nakula āghāta saṃśīrṇa phaṇā cakraiḥ vinirgataiḥ
phaṇayaḥ tad mahā droha vahvi jvālāḥ iva ābabhuḥ
evaṃprakārataḥ babhru maṇḍalaiḥ avakhaṇḍite
māyā maye sarpa jāle sarpiṇī kopam ādadhe

original: tayā saha mahadyuddhaṃ kṛtvā sā nakuleśvarī /
analyzed: tayā saha mahat yuddham kṛtvā sā nakula īśvarī
gāruḍa astram ati krūram samādhatta śilīmukhe
tat gāruḍa astram uddāma jvālā dīpita diṅmukham
praviśya sarpiṇī deham sarpa māyām vyaśoṣayat
māyā śaktoḥ vināśena sarpiṇī vilayam gatā

original: krodhaṃ ca tadvināśena prāptāḥ pañca camūvarāḥ // BndP_3,23.67 //
analyzed: krodham ca tad vināśena prāptāḥ pañca camū varāḥ
yad balena surān sarvān senānyaḥ te vamenire

original: sā sarpiṇī kathāśeṣaṃ nītā nakulavīryataḥ // BndP_3,23.68 //
analyzed: sā sarpiṇī kathā śeṣam nītā nakula vīryataḥ
atas sva bala nāśena bhṛśam kruddhāḥ camū carāḥ
eka udyamena śastra oghaiḥ nakulīm tām avākiran
ekā eva sā tārkṣyarathā pañcabhiḥ pṛtanā īśvarī

original: laghuhastatayā yuddhe cakre vai śastravarṣiṇī // BndP_3,23.70 //
analyzed: laghu hasta tayā yuddhe cakre vai śastra varṣiṇī
paṭṭiśaiḥ musalaiḥ ca eva bhindipālaiḥ sahasraśas
vajra sāra mayaiḥ dantaiḥ vyadaśat marma sīmasu
tatas hāhā rutam ghoram kurvāṇāḥ daitya kiṅkarāḥ
udagra daṃśa nakulaiḥ nakulaiḥ ākulīkṛtāḥ
utpatya gaganāt kecid ghora cītkāra kāriṇaḥ
deśantaḥ tad dviṣām sainya sa kulāḥ prajvala krudhaḥ
karṇeṣu daṣṭvā nāsāyām anye daṣṭāḥ śiraḥ taṭe
pṛṣṭhatas pyadaśan kecid ā gatya vyākṛta kriyāḥ
vikalāḥ chinna varmāṇaḥ bhaya visrasta śastrikāḥ
nakulaiḥ abhibhūtāḥ te nyapatan amara druhaḥ
kecid praviśya nakulāḥ vyāttāni āsyāni vairiṇām
bhogi bhogāni vā ākṛṣya vyadaśan rasanā talam
anye karṇeṣu nakulāḥ prāviśan deva vairiṇām
sūkṣma rūpāḥ viśantisma nānā randhrāṇi babhravaḥ
iti taiḥ abhibhūtāni nakulaiḥ avalokayan
nija sainyāni dīnāni karaṅkaḥ kopam āsthitaḥ

original: anye 'pi ca camūnāthā laghuhastā mahābalāḥ // BndP_3,23.79 //
analyzed: anye pi ca camū nāthāḥ laghu hastāḥ mahā balāḥ
pratibabhru śara stomān vavṛṣuḥ vāridāḥ iva
daitya sainya pati prauḍha kodaḍa utthāḥ śilīmukhāḥ
babhrūṇām danta koṭīṣu kaṭhora ghaṭṭanam vyadhuḥ
camūpati śakhi ūhaiḥ āhatebhyaḥ paraḥśataiḥ
babhrūṇām vajra datebhyaḥ niścakrāma hutāśanaḥ
pañcā api te camū nātha visṛṣṭaiḥ eka helayā
sphurat phalaiḥ śara kulaiḥ babhru senām vyamardayat
itas tatas camū nātha vikṣipta śara koṭibhiḥ
viśīrṇa gātrāḥ nakulāḥ nakulīm paryavārayan
atha sā nakulī vāṇī vāṅmayasya eka nāyikā
nakulānām parāvṛttyā mahāntam roṣam āśritā
akṣīṇanakulam nāma mahā astram sarvatomukham
vahni jvālā parīta agram saṃdadhe śārṅgadhanvani
tad astrataḥ viniṣṭhyūtāḥ nakulāḥ koṭi saṃkhyākāḥ
vajra aṅgāḥ vajra lomānaḥ vajra daṃṣṭrāḥ mahā javā
vajra sārāḥ ca nibiḍā vajra jāla bhayaṅkarā
vajra ākāraiḥ naśaiḥ tūrṇa dārayantaḥ mahī talam
vajra ratna prakāśena locanena api śobhitāḥ
vajra saṃpāta sadṛśāḥ nāsā cītkāra kāriṇaḥ
mardayanti sura arāti sainyam daśana koṭibhiḥ

original: parākramaṃ bahuvidhaṃ tenire te nirenasaḥ // BndP_3,23.88 //
analyzed: parākramam bahuvidham tenire te nirenasaḥ
evam nakula koṭībhiḥ vajra ghoraiḥ mahā balaiḥ
vinaṣṭāḥ pratyavayavam vineśuḥ dānava adhamāḥ
evam vajra mayaiḥ babhuḥ maṇḍalaiḥ śaṇḍite bale
śatākṣauhiṇike saṃkhye te sva mātra avaśeṣitāḥ
ati trāsena roṣeṇa gṛhītāḥ ca camū varāḥ
saṃgrāmam adhikam tenuḥ samākṛṣṭa śarāsanāḥ

original: taiḥ samaṃ bahudhā yuddhaṃ tanvānā nakuleśvarī /
analyzed: taiḥ samam bahudhā yuddham tanvānā nakula īśvarī

original: paṭṭiśena karaṅkasya ciccheda kaṭhinaṃ śiraḥ // BndP_3,23.92 //
analyzed: paṭṭiśena karaṅkasya ciccheda kaṭhinam śiraḥ
kāka vāśita sukhyānām caturṇām api vairiṇām
utpatya utpatya tārkṣyeṇa vyalunāt asinā śiraḥ

original: tādṛśaṃ lāghavaṃ dṛṣṭvā nakulyā śyāmalāṃbikā // BndP_3,23.94 //
analyzed: tādṛśam lāghavam dṛṣṭvā nakulyā śyāmala aṃbikā
bahu mene mahā sattvām duṣṭa asura vināśinīm

original: nijāṅgadevatattvaṃ ca tasyai śyāmāṃbikā dadau // BndP_3,23.95 //
analyzed: nija aṅga deva tattvam ca tasyai śyāmā aṃbikā dadau

original: lokottare guṇe dṛṣṭe kasya na prītisaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: lokottare guṇe dṛṣṭe kasya na prīti saṃbhavaḥ
hata śiṣṭāḥ bhīta bhītāḥ nakulī śaraṇam gatāḥ

original: sāpi tānvīkṣya kṛpayā mā bhaiṣṭeti vihasya ca /
analyzed: sā api tān vīkṣya kṛpayā mā bhaiṣṭa iti vihasya ca
bhavat rājñe raṇa udantam aśeṣam ca nibodhata
tayā evam preṣitāḥ śīghram tat ālokya raṇa kṣitim
muditāḥ te punar bhītyā śūnya kāyām palāyitāḥ

original: tadudantaṃ tataḥ śrutvā bhaṇḍaścaṇḍo ruṣābhavat // BndP_3,23.99 //
analyzed: tat udantam tatas śrutvā bhaṇḍaḥ caṇḍaḥ ruṣā abhavat

original: iti brahmāṇḍamahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge lalitopākhyāne karaṅkādipañcasenāpativadho nāma trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti brahmāṇḍa mahāpurāṇe uttara bhāge lalitopākhyāne karaṅkādipañcasenāpativadhaḥ nāma trayoviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
hateṣu teṣu roṣa andhaḥ niśvasan śūnyakeśvaraḥ
proce yuyutsā vyākula āśayaḥ
bhadra senāpate smākam abhadram samupāgatam
karaṅka ādyaḥ camū nāthāḥ kandalat bhuja vikramāḥ
pāpīyasyā tayā gūḍha māyayā vinipātitāḥ
balāhaka prabhṛtayaḥ sapta ye sainika adhipāḥ
tān udagra bhujā sattvān prāhiṇu pradhanam prati
tri śatam ca akṣauhiṇīnām prasthāpaya saha eva taiḥ
te mardayitvā lalitā sainyam māyā parāyaṇāḥ
aye vijayam āhārya saṃprāpsyanti mama antikam
kīkasa garbha saṃjātāḥ te pracaṇḍa parākramāḥ
balāhaka mukhāḥ sapta bhrātaraḥ jayinaḥ sadā
teṣām avaśyam vijayaḥ bhaviṣyati raṇa aṅgaṇe
iti kuṭilākṣaḥ samāhvayat
balāhaka mukhān sapta senā nāthān mada utkaṭān
balāhakaḥ prathamatas tasmāt paraḥ
anyaḥ phāla mukhaḥ ca eva vikarṇaḥ vikaṭa ānanaḥ
karālāyuḥ karaṭakaḥ saptā ete vīrya śālinaḥ
bhaṇḍāsuram namaskṛtya yuddha kautūhala ulvaṇāḥ
kīkasā sūnavaḥ sarve bhrātaraḥ nyonyam āvṛtāḥ
anyonya su sahāyāḥ ca nirjagamuḥ nagara antarāt
tri śāta akṣauhiṇī senā senānyaḥ nu agaman tadā
ullikhanti ketu jālaiḥ aṃbare ghana maṇḍalam
ghora saṃgrāmiṇī pādā ghātaiḥ mardita bhū talā
pibanti dhūlikā jālaiḥ aśeṣān api sāgarān
bherī niḥ sāṇa taṃpoṭṭa paṇava ānaka nisvanaiḥ
nabhaḥ guṇa mayam viśvam ādadhānāḥ pade pade
tri śata akṣauhiṇī senām tām gṛhītvā madet hatāḥ
praveṣṭum iva viśvasmin kaikaseyāḥ pratasthire
dhṛta roṣa aruṇāḥ sūrya maṇḍalaḥ dīpta kaṅkaṭāḥ
uddīpta śastra bharaṇāḥ celuḥ ddīpta ūrdhva keśinaḥ
sapta lokān pramathitum proṣitāḥ pūrvam uddhatāḥ
bhaṇḍāsureṇa mahatā jagat vijaya kāriṇā
sapta loka vimardena tena dṛṣṭvā mahā balāḥ
proṣitāḥ lalitā sainyam jetu kāmena
te patantaḥ raṇa talam uccala chatra pāṇayaḥ
śakti senām abhimukham sa krodham abhidudruvuḥ
muhur kilakilā rābaiḥ ghoṣayantaḥ diśaḥ daśa

original: devyāstu sainikaṃ yatra tatra te jagamuruddhatāḥ // BndP_3,24.20 //
analyzed: devyāḥ tu sainikam yatra tatra te jagamuḥ uddhatāḥ
sainyam ca lalitā devyāḥ sannaddham śāstra bhīṣaṇam
abhyamitrīṇam abhavat baddha bhrukuṭi niṣṭhuram
pāśinyaḥ musalinyaḥ ca cakriṇyaḥ ca aparāḥ mune
mudgariṇyaḥ paṭṭiśinyaḥ kodaṇḍinyaḥ tathā aparāḥ
anekāḥ śaktayaḥ tīvrāḥ lalitā sainya saṃgatāḥ

original: pibantya iva daityābdhiṃ sānnipetuḥ sahasraśaḥ // BndP_3,24.23 //
analyzed: pibantyaḥ iva daitya abdhim sān nipetuḥ sahasraśas
āyāta āyāta he duṣṭāḥ pāpinyaḥ vanitā adhamāḥ
māyā parigrahaiḥ dūram mohayantyaḥ jaḍa āśayān
neṣyāmaḥ bhavatīḥ adya preta nātha niketanam
śvasat bhujaga saṃkāśaiḥ bāṇaiḥ a tyanta bhīṣaṇaiḥ
iti śaktīḥ bhartsayantaḥ dānavāḥ cakruḥ āhavam
kācid ciccheda daitya indram kaṇṭhe paṭṭiśa pātanāt
tad gala udgalitaḥ rakta pūraḥ ūrdhva mukhaḥ bhavat

original: tatra lagnā bahutarā gṛdhrā maṇḍalatāṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: tatra lagnāḥ bahutarāḥ gṛdhrāḥ maṇḍala tām gatāḥ
taiḥ eva preta nāthasya chatra chaviḥ udañcitā
kācid śaktiḥ murārātim mukta śakti āyudham raṇe
lūna tad śaktinā ekena bāṇena vyalunīta ca
ekā tu gajam ārūḍhā kasyacid daitya durmateḥ
uraḥ sthale sva kariṇā vapra āghātam aśikṣayat
kācid pratibhaṭa ārūḍham dantinam kuṃbha sīmani

original: khaḍgena sahasā hatvā gajasya svapriyaṃ vyadhāt // BndP_3,24.30 //
analyzed: khaḍgena sahasā hatvā gajasya sva priyam vyadhāt
kara muktena cakreṇa kasyacid devavairiṇaḥ

original: dhanurdaṇḍaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā svabhruvoḥ pratimāṃ tanet // BndP_3,24.31 //
analyzed: dhanuḥ daṇḍam dvidhā kṛtvā sva bhruvoḥ pratimām tanet
śaktiḥ anyā śaraiḥ śātaiḥ śātayitvā virodhinaḥ

original: kṛpāṇapadmā romālyāṃ svakīyāyāṃ mudaṃ vyadhāt // BndP_3,24.32 //
analyzed: kṛpāṇa padmā romālyām svakīyāyām mudam vyadhāt
kācid mudgara pātena cūrṇayitvā virodhinaḥ
rathyakra nitaṃbasya svasya tena atanot mudam
ratha kūbaram ugreṇa kasyacid dānava prabhoḥ

original: khaḍgena chindatī svasya priyamuvyāstatāna ha // BndP_3,24.34 //
analyzed: khaḍgena chindatī svasya priyam uvyāḥ tatāna ha
abhyantaram śakti senā daityānām praviveśa ha

original: praviveśa ca daityānāṃ senā śaktibalāntaram // BndP_3,24.35 //
analyzed: praviveśa ca daityānām senā śakti bala antaram
nīra kṣīra vat atyanta āśleṣam śakti suradviṣām
saṃkula ākāra tām prāptaḥ yuddha kāle bhavat tadā
śaktīnām khaḍga pātena lūna śuṇḍārada dvayāḥ

original: daityānāṃ kariṇo mattā mahākroḍā ivābhavan // BndP_3,24.37 //
analyzed: daityānām kariṇaḥ mattāḥ mahā kroḍāḥ iva abhavan

original: evaṃ pravṛtte samare vīrāṇāṃ ca bhayaṅkare /
analyzed: evam pravṛtte samare vīrāṇām ca bhayaṅkare
aśakye smartum api antam kātara tvavatām nṛṇām
bhīṣaṇānām bhīṣaṇe ca śastra vyāpāra durgame
kāla daṇḍa upamam jaṅghā kāṇḍe caṇḍa parākramam
saṃhāragupta nāmānam pūrvam agre samutthitam
dhūma vat dhūsara ākāram pakṣa kṣepa bhayaṅkaram
āruhya vividham yuddham kṛtavān yuddha durmadaḥ

original: pakṣau vitatya krośārdhaṃ sa sthito bhīmaniḥsvanaiḥ /
analyzed: pakṣau vitatya krośa ardham sa sthitaḥ bhīma niḥsvanaiḥ
aṅgāra kuṇḍa vat cañcum vidārya abhakṣayat camūm
saṃhāra guptam sa mahā gṛdhraḥ krūra vilocanaḥ
balāhakam uvāha uccais ākṛṣṭa dhanuṣam raṇe
balāhakaḥ vapuḥ dhunvan gṛdhra pṛṣṭha kṛta sthitiḥ
sapakṣa kūṭa śaila sthaḥ balāhakaḥ iva abhavat
sūcīmukhaḥ ca daitya indraḥ sūcī niṣṭhura pakṣatim
kāka vāhanam āruhya kaṭhinam samaram vyadhāt
mattaḥ parvata śṛṅga ābhaḥ cañcū daṇḍam samudvahan
kāla daṇḍa pramāṇena jaṅghā kāṇḍena bhīṣaṇaḥ
krośa mātra āyatau pakṣau ubhau api samudvahan
sūcīmukha adhiṣṭhitaḥ sau karaṭaḥ kaṭu vāsitaḥ
mardayan cañcu ghātena śaktīnām maṇḍalam mahat
atho phalamukhaḥ phālam gṛhītvā nijam āyudham
kaṅkam āruhya samare cakāśe giri sannibham
vikarṇa ākhyaḥ ca daitya indraḥ camū bhartā mahā balaḥ
bheruṇḍa patana ārūḍhaḥ pracaṇḍa yuddham ātanot
vikaṭa ānana nāmānam vilasat paṭṭiśa āyudham
uvāha samare caṇḍaḥ kukkuṭaḥ ti bhayaṅkaraḥ
garjan kaṇṭha stha romāṇi harṣayan jvalat īkṣaṇaḥ
paśyan puras śakti sainyam cacāla caraṇa āyudhaḥ
karālākṣaḥ ca bhūbhartā
vajra niṣṭhura ghoṣaḥ ca prācalat pretavāhanaḥ
śmaśāna mantra śūreṇa tena saṃsādhitaḥ purā
pretaḥ bhūta samāviṣṭaḥ tam uvāha raṇa ajire
avāk mukhaḥ dīrgha bāhuḥ prasārita pada dvayaḥ
protaḥ vāhana tām prāptaḥ karāla akṣam atha avahat
anyaḥ karaṭakaḥ nāma daitya senā śikhāmaṇiḥ
sardayāmāsa śaktīnām sainyam vetāla vāhanaḥ
yojana āyata mūrtiḥ san vetālaḥ krūra locanaḥ
śmaśāna bhūmau vetālaḥ mantreṇa anena sādhitaḥ
mardayāmāsa pṛtanām śaktīnām tena deśitaḥ
tasya vetāla varyasya vartamānā uṃsa sīmani

original: bahudhāyudhyata tadā śaktibhiḥ saha dānavaḥ // BndP_3,24.57 //
analyzed: bahudhā ayudhyata tadā śaktibhiḥ saha dānavaḥ
evam ete khala ātmānaḥ sapta sapta arṇava upamāḥ
śaktīnām sainikam tatra vyākulīcakruḥ uddhatāḥ
te sapta pūrvam tapasā savitāram atoṣayan

original: tena datto varasteṣāṃ tapastuṣṭena bhāsvatā // BndP_3,24.59 //
analyzed: tena dattaḥ varaḥ teṣām tapaḥ tuṣṭena bhāsvatā
kaikaseyāḥ mahābhāgāḥ bhavatām tapasā adhunā

original: parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ vo bhavanto vṛṇatāṃ varam // BndP_3,24.60 //
analyzed: parituṣṭaḥ smi bhadram vaḥ bhavantaḥ vṛṇatām varam
iti ukte dinanāthena kaikaseyāḥ tapaḥ kṛśāḥ
prārthayāmāsuḥ atyartham durdāntam varam īdṛśam
raṇeṣu sannidhātavyam asmākam netra kukṣiṣu
bhavatā ghora tejobhiḥ dahatā pratirodhinaḥ
tvayā yadā sannihitam tapana asmākam akṣiṣu
tadā akṣi viṣayaḥ sarvaḥ niśceṣṭaḥ bhavatāt prabho
tvad sānnidhya samiddhena netreṇa asmākam īkṣitāḥ
stabdha śastrāḥ bhaviṣyanti pratirodhaka sainikāḥ

original: tataḥ stabdheṣu śastreṣu vīkṣaṇādeva naḥ prabho /
analyzed: tatas stabdheṣu śastreṣu vīkṣaṇāt eva naḥ prabho
niśceṣṭāḥ ripavaḥ smābhiḥ hantavyāḥ sukara tvataḥ
iti pūrvam varaḥ prāptaḥ kaikaseyauḥ divākarāt

original: varadānena te tatra yuddhe cerurmadhoddhatāḥ // BndP_3,24.66 //
analyzed: vara dānena te tatra yuddhe ceruḥ madhoddhatāḥ
atha sūrya samāviṣṭa netraiḥ teḥ tu nirīkṣitāḥ

original: śaktayaḥ stabdhaśastraughā viphalotsā hatāṃ gatāḥ // BndP_3,24.67 //
analyzed: śaktayaḥ stabdha śastra oghāḥ viphala utsāḥ hatām gatāḥ
kīkasā tanayaiḥ taiḥ tu saptabhiḥ sattva śālibhiḥ
viṣṭaṃbhita astra śastrāṇām śaktīnām na udyamaḥ bhavat
udyame śastra stambhena bhūyasā
abhibhūtāḥ sa niśvāsam śaktayaḥ joṣam āsata
atha te vāsaram prāpya nānā praharaṇa udyatāḥ
vyamardayan śakti sainyam daityāḥ sva svāmi deśitāḥ
śaktayaḥ tāḥ tu sainyena nirvyāpārāḥ nirāyudhāḥ
akṣubhyanta śaraiḥ teṣām vajra kaṅkaṭa bhodibhiḥ
śaktayaḥ daitya śastra odhaiḥ viddha gātrāḥ sṛtāmṛjaḥ

original: supallavā raṇe rejuḥ kaṅkolalatikā iva // BndP_3,24.72 //
analyzed: su pallavāḥ raṇe rejuḥ kaṅkola latikāḥ iva
hāhākāram vitanvatyaḥ prapannāḥ laliteśvarīm
cukruśuḥ śaktayaḥ sarvāḥ taiḥ staṃbhita nija āyudhāḥ
atha devī ājñayā daṇḍanāthā pratyaṅga rakṣiṇī
tiraskaraṇikā devī samuttasthau raṇa ajire
tamolipta āhvayam nāma vimānam sarvatomukham
mahāmāyā samāruhya śaktīnām abhayam vyadhāt
tamāla śyāmala ākārā śyāma kañcuka dhāriṇī
śyāma chāye tamaḥ lipte śyāma yukta turaṅgame
vāsantī mohana abhikhyam dhanuḥ ādāya sa svanam
siṃhanādam vinadya iṣūn avarṣat sarpa sannibhān
kṛṣṇa rūpa bhujaṅga bhān adhas musala saṃnibhān
mohana astra viniṣṭhyūtān bāṇān daityāḥ na sehire
itas tatas mardyamānāḥ mahā māyā śilīmukhaiḥ

original: prakopaṃ paramaṃ prāptā balāhakamukhāḥ khalāḥ // BndP_3,24.79 //
analyzed: prakopam paramam prāptāḥ balāhaka mukhāḥ khalāḥ
atho tiraskaraṇī aṃbā daṇḍanāthā nideśataḥ

original: andhābhidhaṃ mahāstraṃ sā mumoca dviṣatāṃ gaṇe // BndP_3,24.80 //
analyzed: andha abhidham mahā astram sā mumoca dviṣatām gaṇe
balāhaka ādyāḥ te sapta dinanātha vara uddhatāḥ

original: andhāstreṇa nijaṃ netraṃ dadhire cchāditaṃ yathā // BndP_3,24.81 //
analyzed: andha astreṇa nijam netram dadhire chāditam yathā
tiraskaraṇikā devyāḥ mahā mohana dhanvanaḥ
udgatena andha bāṇena cakṣuḥ teṣām vyadhīyata

original: andhīkṛtāśca te sapta na tu praikṣanta kiñcana /
analyzed: andhīkṛtāḥ ca te sapta na tu praikṣanta kiñcana
tad vīkṣaṇasya virahāt śastra stambhaḥ kṣayam gataḥ
punar sa siṃhanādam tāḥ prodyata āyudha pāṇayaḥ
cakruḥ samara sannāham daityānām prajighāṃsayā
tiraskaraṇikām devīm agre kṛtvā mahā balām

original: sadupāyaprasaṅgena bhṛśaṃ tuṣṭā raṇaṃ vyadhuḥ // BndP_3,24.85 //
analyzed: sat upāya prasaṅgena bhṛśam tuṣṭāḥ raṇam vyadhuḥ
sādhu sādhu mahābhāge tiraskaraṇikā aṃbike
sthāne kṛta tiraskārāḥ dvipām eṣām durātmanām
tvam hi durjana netrāṇām tiraskāra mahā oṣadhī
tvayā baddha dṛśānena daitya cakreṇa bhūyate
deva kāryam idam devi tvayā samyak anuṣṭitam
asmādṛśām ajayyeṣu yadā eṣu vyasanam kṛtam
tat tvayā eva durācārān etān sapta mahā asurān
nihatān lalitā śrutvā santoṣam param āpsyati
evam tvayā viracite daṇḍinī prīti māpsyati
mantriṇī api mahābhāgāya āsyati eva parām mudam
tasmāt tvam eva sapta etān nigṛhaṇa raṇa ajire

original: eṣāṃ sainyaṃ tu nikhilaṃ nāśayāma udāyudhāḥ // BndP_3,24.91 //
analyzed: eṣām sainyam tu nikhilam nāśayāmaḥ udāyudhāḥ
iti uktvā preritā tābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ ūrddha kautukān
tamaḥ liptena yānena balāhaka balam yayau
tām āyāntīm samāvekṣya te sapta atha sura adhamāḥ

original: punareva ca sāvitraṃ varaṃ sasmarurañjasā // BndP_3,24.93 //
analyzed: punar eva ca sāvitram varam sasmaruḥ añjasā
praviṣṭam api sāvitram na aśakam tad nirodhane
tiraskṛtam tu netra stham tiraskaraṇi tejasā
vara dāna astra roṣa andham mahā bala parākramam
astreṇa ca ruṣā ca andham balāhaka mahā asuram
ākṛṣya keśeṣu asinā cakarta antardhi devatā
tasya vāhana gṛdhrasya lunānā patriṇā śiraḥ
sūcīmukhasya abhimukham tiraskaraṇikā vrajat
tasya paṭṭiśa pātena vilūya kaṭhinam śiraḥ
anyeṣām api pañcānām pañcatvam akarot śanais
taiḥ sapta daitya muṇḍaiḥ ca grathita anyonya keśakaiḥ
hāra dāma gale kṛtvā nanāda antardhi devatā
samastam api tat sainyam śaktayaḥ krodha sūrcchitāḥ
hatvā tad rakta salilaiḥ bahvīḥ prāvāhayat nadīḥ
tatra āścaryam abhūt bhūri māhāmāyā aṃbikā kṛtam
balāhaka ādi senā nyām dṛṣṭi rodhana vaibhavāt
hata śiṣṭāḥ katipayāḥ bahu vitrāsa saṅkulāḥ
śaraṇam jagmuḥ ati ārttāḥ krandantam śūnyakeśvaram
daṇḍinīm ca mahāmāyām praśaṃsanti muhur muhur
prasādam aparam cakṣuḥ tasyāḥ ādāyapipriyuḥ
sādhu sādhu iti tatrasthāḥ śaktayaḥ kampa maulayaḥ
tiraskaraṇikām devīm aślāghanta pade pade

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍamahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastyasaṃvāde lalitopākhyāne balāhakādisaptasenāpativadho nāma caturviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍa mahāpurāṇe uttara bhāge hayagrīva agastya saṃvāde lalita upākhyāne balāhakādisaptasenāpativadhaḥ nāma caturviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
tatas śrutvā vadham teṣām tapaḥ balavatām api
nyaśvasat kṛṣṇa sarpa indraḥ iva bhaṇḍaḥ mahā asuraḥ
ekānte mantrayāmāsa saḥ āhūya mahodarau

original: bhaṇḍaḥ pracaṇḍaśaiṇḍīryaḥ kāṅkṣamāṇo raṇe jayam // BndP_3,25.2 //
analyzed: bhaṇḍaḥ pracaṇḍa śaiṇḍīryaḥ kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ raṇe jayam
yuvarājaḥ pi sa krodhaḥ viṣaṅgeṇa yavīyasā
bhaṇḍāsuram namaskṛtya mantra sthānam upāgamat
atyāptaiḥ mantribhiḥ yuktaḥ kuṭila akṣa puraḥsaraiḥ
lalitāvijaye mantram cakāra kvathita āśyaḥ
uvāca
aho bata kula bhraṃśaḥ samāyātaḥ suradviṣām
upekṣām adhunā kartum pravṛttaḥ balavān vidhiḥ
mad bhṛtya nāma mātreṇa vidravanti divaukasaḥ
tādṛśānām iha asmākam āgataḥ yam viparyayaḥ
karoti balinam klībam dhaninam dhana varjitam
dīrgha āyuṣam anāyuṣkam durdhātā bhavitavya tā
kva sattvam asmad bāhunām kva iyam durllalitā vadhūḥ

original: akāṇḍa eva vidhinā kṛto 'yaṃ niṣṭhuro vidhiḥ // BndP_3,25.8 //
analyzed: akāṇḍaḥ eva vidhinā kṛtaḥ yam niṣṭhuraḥ vidhiḥ
durghaṭa śauryayā
adhi saṃgrāma bhū cakre senānyaḥ vinipātitāḥ
evam uddāma darpa āḍhyā vanitā kā api māyinī
yadi saṃpraharati asmān dhik balam naḥ bhuja arjitam

original: imaṃ prasaṃgaṃ vaktuṃ ca jihvā jihveti māmakī /
analyzed: imam prasaṃgam vaktum ca jihvā jihvā iti māmakī

original: vanitā kimu matsainyaṃ marda yiṣyati durmadā // BndP_3,25.11 //
analyzed: vanitā kimu mad sainyam marda yiṣyati durmadā
tat atra mūla chedāya tasyāḥ yatnaḥ vidhīyatām
mayā cāra mukhāt jñātā tasyāḥ vṛttiḥ mahā balā
sarveṣām api sainyānām paścāt eva avatiṣṭhate
agratas calitam sainyam haya hasti ratha ādikam
asmin eva hi avasare pārṣṇigrāhaḥ vidhīyatām
pārṣṇigraham imam kartum viṣaṅgaḥ caturaḥ bhavet
tena prauḍha mada unmatāḥ bahu saṃgrāma durmadāḥ

original: daśa pañca ca senānyaḥ saha yāntu yuyutsayā // BndP_3,25.15 //
analyzed: daśa pañca ca senānyaḥ saha yāntu yuyutsayā

original: pṛṣṭhataḥ parivārāstu na tathā saṃti te punaḥ /

original: alpaistu rakṣitā vai syāttenaivāsau sunigrahā // BndP_3,25.16 //
analyzed: alpaiḥ tu rakṣitā vai syāt tena eva asau su nigrahā
atas tvam bahu sannāham āvidhāya mada utkaṭaḥ

original: alpīyasī tvayā sārddhaṃ senā gacchatu vikramāt /
analyzed: alpīyasī tvayā sārddham senā gacchatu vikramāt

original: akṣauhiṇyaśca senānāṃ daśa pañca calantu te /
analyzed: akṣauhiṇyaḥ ca senānām daśa pañca calantu te

original: tvaṃ guptaveṣastāṃ duṣṭāṃ sannipatya dṛḍhaṃ jahi // BndP_3,25.19 //
analyzed: tvam gupta veṣaḥ tām duṣṭām sannipatya dṛḍham jahi
sā eva niḥśeṣa śaktīnām mūla bhūtā mahīyasī

vahat muhar vījyamānam cāmarāṇām catuṣṭayam
uttaṅga ketu saṃghāta likhita aṃbuda maṇḍalaḥ

original: nibṛtaṃ saṃnipatya tvaṃ cihnenānena lakṣitām // BndP_3,25.24 //

original: purataścalite sainye sattvaśālini sā vadhūḥ // BndP_3,25.25 //
analyzed: puratas calite sainye sattva śālini sā vadhūḥ
strī mātra rakṣā bhavataḥ vaśam eṣyati sa tvaram

original: ādyo madanako nāma dīrghajihvo dvitīyakaḥ // BndP_3,25.27 //
analyzed: ādyaḥ madanakaḥ nāma dīrghajihvaḥ dvitīyakaḥ
hubakaḥ hulumuluḥ ca kaklasaḥ kaklivāhanaḥ
thuklasaḥ puṇḍraketuḥ ca caṇḍabāhuḥ ca kukkuraḥ
jaṃbukākṣaḥ jaṃbhanaḥ ca tīkṣṇaśṛṅgaḥ trikaṇṭakaḥ

āgamiṣyanti senānyaḥ damana ādyāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: parasya kaṭakaṃ naiva yathā jānāti te gatim /
analyzed: parasya kaṭakam nā eva yathā jānāti te gatim
tathā gupta samācāraḥ pārṣṇigrāham samācara
asmin kārye su mahatām prauḍhimānam samudvahan

original: niṣaṅga tvaṃ hi tabhase jayasiddhimanuttamām // BndP_3,25.32 //
analyzed: niṣaṅga tvam hi tabhase jaya siddhim anuttamām
iti mantrita mantraḥ yam durmantrī bhaṇḍa dānavaḥ
viṣaṅgam preṣayāmāsa rakṣitam sainya pālakaiḥ
atha śrī lalitā devyāḥ pārṣṇigrāha kṛta udyame
yuvarāja anuje daitye sūryaḥ stagirim āyayau
prathame yuddha divase vyatīte loka bhīṣaṇe
andhakāraḥ samabhavat tasya bāhya cikīrṣayā
mahiṣa skandha dhūmra ābham vana kroḍa vapuḥ dduti
nīlakaṇṭha nibha chāyam nibiḍam paprathe tamaḥ
kuñjeṣu piṇḍitam iva pradhāvat iva saṃdhiṣu
ujjihānam iva kṣoṇī vivarebhyaḥ sahasraśas
nirgacchat iva śailānām bhūri kandara mandirāt
kvacid dīpa prabhā jāle kṛta kātara ceṣṭitam
datta avalaṃbanam iva strīṇām karṇa utpala tviṣi
ekībhūtam iva prauḍha diṅnāgam iva kajjale
ābaddha maitrakam iva sphurat chādvala maṇḍale
kṛta priya āśleṣam iva sphurantīṣu asi yaṣṭiṣu
gupta praviṣṭam iva ca śyāmāsu vana paṅktiṣu
krameṇa bahulībhūtam prasasāra mahattamaḥ
triyāmā vāma nayanā nīla kañcuka rociṣā
timireṇa āvṛtam viśvam na kiñcid pratyapadyata
asurāṇām praduṣṭānām rātriḥ eva bala āvahā
teṣām māyā vilāsaḥ yam tasyām eva hi vardhate

original: atha pracalitaṃ sainyaṃ viṣaṅgeṇa mahaujasā // BndP_3,25.43 //
analyzed: atha pracalitam sainyam viṣaṅgeṇa mahā ojasā
dhauta khaḍga latā chāyā vardhiṣṇu timira chaṭam
damana ādyāḥ ca senānyaḥ śmāma kaṅkaṭa dhāriṇaḥ
śyāma uṣṇīṣa dharāḥ śyāma varṇa sarva paricchadāḥ
eka tvam iva saṃprāptāḥ timireṇa ati bhūyasā
viṣaṅgam anusaṃceluḥ kṛta agraja namaskṛtim
kūṭena yuddha kṛtyena vijigīṣuḥ maheśvarīm
meghaḍaṃbarakam nāma dadhe vakṣasi kaṅkaṭam
yathā tasya niśā yuddha anurūpaḥ veṣa saṃgrahaḥ

original: na ca dundubhinisvāno na ca marddalagarjitam // BndP_3,25.48 //
analyzed: na ca dundubhi nisvānaḥ na ca marddala garjitam
paṇava ānaka bherīṇām na ca ghoṣa vijṛṃbhaṇam
gupta ācārāḥ pracalitāḥ timireṇa samāvṛtāḥ
paraiḥ adṛśya gatayaḥ viṣkośīkṛta riṣṭayaḥ
paścima abhimukham yānti lalitāyāḥ patākinīm
āvṛta uttara mārgeṇa pūrva bhāgam aśiśriyan
niśvāsam api sa svānam akurvantaḥ pade pade
sa avadhānāḥ pracalitāḥ pārṣṇigrāhāya dānavāḥ

original: bhūyaḥ purasya digbhāgaṃ gatvā mandaparākramāḥ // BndP_3,25.52 //
analyzed: bhūyas purasya digbhāgam gatvā manda parākramāḥ
lalitā sainyam eva svān sūcayantaḥ prapṛcchataḥ
āgatya nibhṛtam pṛṣṭhe kavaca channa vigrahāḥ
cakrarāja ratham tuṅgam meru mandara saṃnibham
apaśyan ati dīptābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ parivāritam
tatra muktā ātapatrasya varttamānām adhas sthale
sahasra āditya saṃkāśām paścima abhimukhīm sthitām
kāma īśvarā ādi nityābhiḥ sva samāna samṛddhibhiḥ
narma ālāpa vinodena sevyamānām ratha uttame
tām tathā bhūta vṛttāntām a tādṛśa raṇa udyamām
purogatam mahat sainyam vīkṣamāṇa sa kautukam
manvānaḥ ca hi tām eva viṣaṅgaḥ su durāśayaḥ
pṛṣṭhavaṃśe ratha indrasya ghaṭṭayāmāsa sainikaiḥ
tatra aṇi mā ādi śaktīnām parivāra varūthinī
mahā kalakalam cakruḥ aṇima ādyāḥ paraḥśatam
paṭṭiśaiḥ drughaṇaiḥ ca eva bhindipālaiḥ bhuśuṇḍibhiḥ
kaṭhora vajra nirdhāta niṣṭhuraiḥ śakti maṇḍalaiḥ
mardayantaḥ mahā sattvāḥ samaram bahu menire
ākasmika raṇa utsāha viparyāviṣṭa vigraham
akāṇḍa kṣubhitam ca āsīt ratha stham śakti maṇḍalam
vipāṭaiḥ pāṭayāmāsuḥ adṛśyaiḥ andhakāriṇaḥ
tatas cakraratha indrasya navame parvaṇi sthitāḥ
adṛśyamāna śastrāṇām adṛśya nija varmaṇām
timira channa rūpāṇām dānavānām śilīmukhaiḥ
itas tatas bahu kliṣṭam channa varmita marmavat

original: śaktīnāṃ maṇḍalaṃ tene krandanaṃ lalitāṃ prati /

daśa akṣauhiṇikā yuktam kuṭila akṣam mahā ojasam
lalitā sainya nāśāya yuddhāya prajighāya saḥ
yathā paścāt kalakalam śrutvā agrevartinī camūḥ

original: nāgacchati tathā cakre kuṭilākṣo mahāraṇam // BndP_3,25.68 //
analyzed: na āgacchati tathā cakre kuṭilākṣaḥ mahā raṇam
evam ca ubhayatas yuddham paścāt agre tathā bhavat
atyanta tumulam ca āsīt śaktīnām sainike mahat
naktasattvāḥ ca daitya indrāḥ timireṇa samāvṛtāḥ
itas tatas śithila tām kaṇṭake ninyuḥ uddhatāḥ
niṣaṅgeṇa durāśena dhamana ādyaiḥ camū varaiḥ
camūbhiḥ ca praṇahitāḥ nyapatan śatru koṭayaḥ
tābhiḥ daitya astra mālābhiḥ cakrarāja rathaḥ vṛtaḥ
baka āvalī nibiḍataḥ śailarājaḥ iva ābabhau
ākrānta parvaṇā adhastāt viṣaṅgeṇa durātmanā
muktaḥ ekaḥ śaraḥ devyāḥ tālavṛntam acūrṇayat
atha tena avyāhitena saṃbhrānte śakti maṇḍale
kāmeśvarī mukhāḥ nityāḥ mahāntam krodham āyayuḥ
īṣat bhṛkuṭi saṃsaktam śrī devyāḥ vadana aṃbujam
avalokya bhṛśa udvignāḥ nityāḥ dadhuḥ ati śramam
nityā kāla svarūpiṇyaḥ pratyekam tithi vigrahāḥ

original: praṇipatya ca tāṃ devīṃ mahārājñīṃ mahodayām /
analyzed: praṇipatya ca tām devīm mahā rājñīm mahodayām
ūcuḥ vācam akāṇḍa utthām yuddha kautuka gadgadām

devadevī mahā rājñī tava agre brekṣitām camūm
daṇḍinī mantranātha ādi mahā śakti ābha pālitām
kātarāḥ duṣṭāḥ māyā chadma parāyaṇāḥ
pārṣṇigrāheṇa yuddhena bādhante ratha puṅgavam
tasmāt timira saṃchanna mūrtīnām vibudha druhām

original: śamayāmo vayaṃ darpaṃ kṣaṇamātraṃ vilokaya // BndP_3,25.80 //
analyzed: śamayāmaḥ vayam darpam kṣaṇa mātram vilokaya

original: yā vahnivāsinī nityā yā jvālāmālinī parā /

original: tābhyāṃ pradīpite yuddhe draṣṭuṃ śaktāḥ suradviṣaḥ // BndP_3,25.81 //
analyzed: tābhyām pradīpite yuddhe draṣṭum śaktāḥ suradviṣaḥ

original: ājñāṃ dehi mahārājñi mardanārthaṃ durātmanām // BndP_3,25.82 //
analyzed: ājñām dehi mahā rājñi mardana artham durātmanām
iti ukte sati nityābhiḥ tathā astu iti jagāda sā

analyzed: kā daṇḍinī mantriṇī kā mahā rājñī iti kā punar

original: yuddhaṃ ca kīdṛśamiti kṣepaṃ bhūri vitanvate // BndP_3,27.64 //
analyzed: yuddham ca kīdṛśam iti kṣepam bhūri vitanvate
asmin eva antare śatruḥ āgacchati mahā balaḥ
uddaṇḍa bherī nisvānaiḥ vibhindan iva rodasī
atra yat prāptarūpam tat mahā rājñi prapadyatām

original: ityuktvā saha daṇḍinyā mantriṇī praṇatiṃ vyadhāt // BndP_3,27.66 //
analyzed: iti uktvā saha daṇḍinyāḥ mantriṇī praṇatim vyadhāt

original: tataḥ sā lalitā devī kāmeśvaramukhaṃ prati /
analyzed: tatas sā lalitā devī kāmeśvara mukham prati
samahasat ati rakta rada āvaliḥ
tasyāḥ smita prabhā puñje kuñjara ākṛtimān mukhe
kaṭa kroḍa galat dānaḥ kaścid eva vyajṛṃbhata
bījapūra gadām ikṣu cāpam śūlam sudarśanam
abja pāśa utpala vrīhimañjarī varadām kuśān

original: ratnakuṃbhaṃ ca daśabhiḥ svakairhastaiḥ samudvahan // BndP_3,27.70 //
analyzed: ratna kuṃbham ca daśabhiḥ svakaiḥ hastaiḥ samudvahan
tundilaḥ candra cūḍālaḥ mandra bṛṃhita nisvanaḥ
siddhi lakṣmī samāśliṣṭaḥ praṇanāma maheśvarīm
tayā kṛta āśīḥ sa mahān gaṇanāthaḥ gajānanaḥ
jaya vighna mahā yantram bhettum vegāt viniryayau
antarā iva hi śālasya bhramat dantāvala ānanaḥ
nibhṛtam kutracid lagnam jaya vighnam vyalokayat
sa devaḥ ghora nirghātaiḥ duḥsahaiḥ danta pātanaiḥ
kṣaṇāt cūrmīkaroti sma jaya vighna mahā śilām
tatra sthitābhiḥ duṣṭābhiḥ devatābhiḥ saha eva saḥ
parāga śeṣa tām nītvā tat yantram prakṣipat divi
tatas kilakilā rāvam kṛtvā ālasya vivarjitāḥ

original: udyatāḥ samaraṃ kartuṃ śaktayaḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ // BndP_3,27.76 //
analyzed: udyatāḥ samaram kartum śaktayaḥ śastra pāṇayaḥ
sa deti vadanaḥ kaṇṭha kalita ākuṇṭha nisvanaḥ

original: jayayantraṃ hi tatsṛṣṭaṃ tathā rātrau vyanāśayat // BndP_3,27.77 //
analyzed: jaya yantram hi tat sṛṣṭam tathā rātrau vyanāśayat
imam vṛttāntam ākarṇya bhaṇḍaḥ sa kṣobham āyayau
sasarjaya bahūn ātma rūpān dantāvala ānanān
te kaṭa kroḍa vigalat mada saurabha cañcalaiḥ
cañcarīka kulaiḥ agre gīyamāna mahā udayāḥ
sphurat dāḍima kiñjalka vikṣepa kara rociṣaḥ
sadā ratnākara aneka helayā pātum udyatāḥ
āmoda pramukhāḥ ṛddhi mukhya śakti niṣevitāḥ
āmodaḥ ca pramodaḥ ca mumukhaḥ durmukhaḥ tathā
ari ghnaḥ vighna karttā ca ṣaṭ ete vighna nāyakāḥ
te sapta koṭi saṃkhyānām heraṃbāṇām adhīśvarāḥ
te puras calitāḥ tasya mahāgaṇapate raṇe
agni prākāra valayāt vinirgatya gaja ānanāḥ
krodha huṅkāra tumulāḥ prati padyanta dānavān
punar pracaṇḍa phūtkāra badhirīkṛta viṣṭapāḥ
papāta daitya sainyeṣu gaṇa cakra camū gaṇaḥ
acchidat niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ gaṇanāthaḥ sa dānavān
gaṇanāthena tasya abhūt viśukrasya mahā ojasaḥ
yuddham uddhata huṅkāra bhinna kārmuka niḥsvanam
bhrukuṭī kuṭile cakre daṣṭa uṣṭham ati pāṭalam

original: viśukro yudhi bibhrāṇaḥ samayudhyata tena saḥ // BndP_3,27.87 //
analyzed: viśukraḥ yudhi bibhrāṇaḥ samayudhyata tena saḥ
śastra āghaṭṭana nisvānaiḥ huṃkāraiḥ ca suradviṣām
daitya sapti khura krīḍat kuddālī kūṭa nisvanaiḥ
phetkāraiḥ ca bhayena ākrandanaiḥ api
heṣayā ca haya śreṇyāḥ ratha cakra svanaiḥ api
dhanuṣām guṇa nissvānaiḥ cakra cītkaraṇaiḥ api
śarasātkāra ghoṣaiḥ ca vīra bhāṣā kadaṃbakaiḥ
aṭṭahāsaiḥ mahā indrāṇām siṃhanādaiḥ ca bhūriśas
kṣubhyat digantaram tatra vavṛdhe yuddham uddhatam
triṃśat akṣauhiṇī senā viśukrasya durātmanaḥ
pratyekam yodhayā māsuḥ gaṇa nāthāḥ mahā rathāḥ
dantaiḥ marma vibhindantaḥ viṣṭaṃyataḥ ca śuṇḍayā
krodhayantaḥ karṇa tālaiḥ puṣkala āvarttaka upamaiḥ
nāsā śvāsaiḥ ca paruṣaiḥ vikṣipantaḥ patākinīm
urobhiḥ mardayantaḥ ca śaila vapra sama prabhaiḥ
piṃṣantaḥ ca padāghātaiḥ pīnaiḥ ghnantaḥ tathā udaraiḥ
vibhindantaḥ ca śūlena kṛttantaḥ cakra pātanaiḥ
śaṅkha svanena mahatā trāsayantaḥ varūthinīm
gaṇanātha mukha udbhūtāḥ gaja vakrāḥ sahasraśas
dhūlī śeṣam samastam tat sainyam cakruḥ mahā udyatāḥ
atha krodha samāviṣṭaḥ nija sainya purogamaḥ

original: preṣayāmāsa devasya gajāsura masau punaḥ // BndP_3,27.98 //
analyzed: preṣayāmāsa devasya gajāsura masau punar
pracaṇḍa siṃhanādena gaja daityena
sapta akṣauhiṇi yuktena yuyudhe sa gaṇeśvaraḥ
hīyamānam samālokya gaja asura bhujāḥ balam

original: vardhamānaṃ ca tadvīryaṃ viśukraḥ prapalāyitaḥ // BndP_3,27.100 //
analyzed: vardhamānam ca tad vīryam viśukraḥ prapalāyitaḥ
saḥ ekaḥ eva vīra idraḥ pracalan ākhu vāhanaḥ
sapta akṣauhiṇikā yuktam gaja asuram amardayat
gaja asure ca nihate viśukre prapalāyite
lalitā antikam āpede mahā āgama patiḥ mṛdhāt
kālarātriḥ ca daityānām sā rātriḥ viratim gatā

original: lalitā cāti muditā babhūvāsya parākramaiḥ // BndP_3,27.103 //
analyzed: lalitā ca ati muditā babhūva asya parākramaiḥ
vitatāra mahā rājñī prīyamāṇā gaṇeśituḥ
sarva daivata pūjāyāḥ pūrva pūjya tvam uttamam

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍapurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastyasaṃvāde lalitopākhyāne gaṇanāthaparākramo nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍapurāṇe uttara bhāge hayagrīva agastya saṃvāde lalitā upākhyāne gaṇanāthaparākramaḥ nāma saptaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
raṇebhagnam mahā daityam bhaṇḍa daityaḥ sahodaram

original: senānāṃ kadanaṃ śrutvā santapto bahucintayā // BndP_3,28.1 //
analyzed: senānām kadanam śrutvā santaptaḥ bahu cintayā
ubhau api sametau tau yuktau sarvaiḥ ca sainikaiḥ
preṣayāmāsa yuddhāya bhaṇḍa daityaḥ sahodarau
tau ubhau parama kruddhau bhaṇḍa daityena deśitau
viṣaṅgaḥ ca viśukraḥ ca mahodyama mavāpanuḥ
kaniṣṭha sahitam tatra yuvarājam mahā balam
viśukram anuvavrāja senā trailokya kampinī
akṣauhiṇī catuḥśatyā senānām āvṛtaḥ ca saḥ
yuvarājaḥ pravavṛdhe pratāpena mahīyasā
ulūkajit prabhṛtayaḥ bhāgineyāḥ daśa uddhatāḥ

original: bhaṇḍasya ca bhaginyāntu dhūminyāṃ jātayonayaḥ // BndP_3,28.6 //
analyzed: ca bhaginyām tu dhūminyām jāta yonayaḥ
kṛta astra śikṣā bhaṇḍena mātulena mahīyasā
vikrameṇa valantaḥ te senā nāthāḥ pratasthire
prodgataiḥ cāpa nirghoṣaiḥ ghoṣayantaḥ diśaḥ daśa
dvayoḥ mātulayoḥ prītim bhāgineyāḥ vitenire
ārūḍha yānāḥ pratyeka gāḍha ahaṅkāra śālinaḥ
ākṛṣṭa guru dhanvānaḥ viśukram anuvavrajuḥ
yauvarājya prabhā cihna chatra cāmara śobhitaḥ
ārūḍha vāraṇaḥ prāpa viśukraḥ yuddha medinīm
tatas kalakala ārāva kāriṇyā senayā vṛtaḥ

original: viśukraḥ paṭu dadhvāna siṃhanādaṃ bhayaṅkaram // BndP_3,28.11 //
analyzed: viśukraḥ paṭu dadhvāna siṃhanādam bhayaṅkaram
tad kṣobhāt kṣubhita svāntāḥ śaktayaḥ saṃbhrama uddhatāḥ
agni prākāra valayāt nirjagamuḥ baddha paṅkayaḥ
taḍit mayam iva ākāśam kurvantyaḥ sva sva rociṣā
rakta amvuja āvṛtam iva vyoma cakram raṇa unmukhāḥ
atha bhaṇḍa kanīyāṃsau āgatau yuddha durmadau
niśamya mantriṇī daṇḍa nāyake
kiricakam jñeya cakram ārūḍhe rathaśekharam
dhṛta ātapatra valaye cāmarābhyām ca vījite
apsarobhiḥ pranṛttābhiḥ gīyamāna mahā udaye
nirjagamatuḥ raṇam kartum ubhābhyām lalitā ājñayā
śrī cakraratha rājasya rakṣaṇa artham niveśite
śata akṣauhiṇikām senām varjayitvā astra bhīṣaṇam
anyat sarvam camu jālam nirjagāma raṇa unmukhī
puratas prācalat daṇḍanāthā ratha niṣeduṣī
ekayā eva kara aṅgulyā ghūrṇayantī halāyudham
musalam ca anya hastena bhrāmayantī muhur muhur
tarala indu kalā cūḍā sphurat potra mukha ambujā
puras prahartrī samare sarvadā vikrama uddhatā
asyāḥ anupracalitā geya cakra ratha sthitā
dhanuṣaḥ dhvaninā viśvam pūrayantī mahā uddhatā
veṇī kṛta kaca nyasta vilasat candra pallavā
sphurat tritaya netreṇa sindūra tilaka tviṣā
pāṇinā padma ramyeṇa maṇi kaṅkaṇa cāruṇā
tūṇīra mukhataḥ kṛṣṭam bhrāmayantī śilīmukham
jaya vardhasva vardhasva iti ati harṣa samākule
nṛtyadbhiḥ divya munibhiḥ varddhita āśīḥ vacaḥ mṛtaiḥ
geya cakra ratha indrasya cakra nemi vighaṭṭanaiḥ
dārayantī kṣiti talam daityānām hṛdayaiḥ saha
gītibandhena amarībhiḥ bahvībhiḥ gīta vaibhavā
akṣauhiṇī sahasrāṇām aṣṭakam samara uddhatam
karṣatī kalpa viśleṣa nirmaryāda abdhi saṃnibham
tasyāḥ śakti camū cakre kāścid kanaka rociṣaḥ
kāścid dāḍima saṃkāśāḥ kāścid jīmūta rociṣaḥ
anyāḥ siṃdūra rucayaḥ parāḥ pāṭala pāṭalāḥ
kāca adrikā ambarāḥ kāścid parāḥ śyāmala komalāḥ
anyāḥ tu hīraka prakhyāḥ parāḥ gārutmata upamāḥ
viruddhaiḥ pañcabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ miśritaiḥ śata koṭibhiḥ
vyañjayantyaḥ deha rucam katicid vividha āyudhāḥ
asaṃkhyāḥ śaktayaḥ celuḥ daṇḍinyāḥ sainike tathā
tathā eva sainya sannāhaḥ mantriṇyāḥ kumbhasambhava
yathā bhūṣaṇa veṣa ādi yathā prabhāva lakṣaṇam
yathā sat guṇa śāli tvam yathā ca āśrita lakṣaṇam

original: yathā daityaughasaṃhāro yathā sarvaiśca pūjitā // BndP_3,28.32 //
analyzed: yathā daitya ogha saṃhāraḥ yathā sarvaiḥ ca pūjitā
yathā śaktiḥ mahā rājñyāḥ deḍinyaḥ ca tathā akhilam

original: viśeṣastu paraṃ tasyāḥ sācivye tatkare sthitam /
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ tu param tasyāḥ sācivye tad kare sthitam
mahā rājñī vitīrṇam tad ājñā mudrā aṅgulīyakam
ittham pracalite sainye mantriṇī daṇḍanāthayoḥ
tad bhāra bhaṅgurā bhūmiḥ delā līlām alaṃbata
tatas pravavṛte yuddham tumulam roma harṣaṇam
haya sthaiḥ haya sādinyaḥ ratha sthaiḥ ratha saṃsthitāḥ
ādhoraṇaiḥ hastipakāḥ khaḍgaiḥ padgāḥ ca saṅgatāḥ
daṇḍanātha viṣaṅgeṇa samayudhyanta saṅgare
viśukreṇa samam śyāmā vikṛṣṭa maṇi kārmukā
aśvarūḍhā cakāra uccais saha ulūkajitā raṇam
sampad īśān ca jagrāha puruṣeṇa yuyutsayā
viṣeṇa nakulī devī samāhvāsta yuyutsayā
kuntiṣeṇena samaram mahā māyā tadā akarot
maladena samam cakre yuddham unmatta bhairavī

original: laghuśyāmā cakāroccaiḥ kuśūreṇa samaṃ raṇam // BndP_3,28.40 //
analyzed: laghuśyāmā cakāra uccais kuśūreṇa samam raṇam
svapneśī maṅgala ākhyena daitya indreṇa raṇam vyadhāt

original: vāgvādinī tu jaghaṭe drughaṇena samaṃ raṇe // BndP_3,28.41 //
analyzed: vāgvādinī tu jaghaṭe drughaṇena samam raṇe
kolāṭena ca duṣṭena caṇḍakālī akarot raṇam
akṣauhiṇībhiḥ daityānām śata akṣauhiṇikāḥ tathā
mahāntam samare cakruḥ anyonyam krodha mūrchitāḥ
pravartamāne samare viśukraḥ duṣṭa dānavaḥ

original: vardhamānāṃ śakticamūṃ hīyamānāṃ nijāṃ camūm // BndP_3,28.43 //
analyzed: vardhamānām śakti camūm hīyamānām nijām camūm
avalokya ruṣā āviṣṭaḥ sa kṛṣṭa guru kārmukaḥ

original: śaktisainye samaste 'pi tṛṣāstraṃ pramumoca ha // BndP_3,28.44 //
analyzed: śakti sainye samaste tṛṣā astram pramumoca ha
tena dāva anala jvālā dīptena mathitam balam
tṛtīye yuddha divase yāma mātram gate ravau
viśukra mukta tarṣa astra vyākulāḥ śaktayaḥ van
kṣobhayan indriya grāmam tālu mūlam viśoṣayan
rūkṣayan karṇa kuharam aṅga daurvalyam āhavan
pātayan pṛthivī pṛṣṭhe deham visraṃsita āyudham
āvirbabhūva śaktīnām ati tīvraḥ tṛṣā jvaraḥ
yuddheṣu an udyama kṛtā sarva utsāha virodhinā
tarṣeṇa tena kvathitam śakti sainyam vilokyasā

original: mantriṇī saha potriṇyā bhṛśaṃ cintāmavāpa ha // BndP_3,28.48 //
analyzed: mantriṇī saha potriṇyā bhṛśam cintām avāpa ha
uvāca tām daṇḍanāthām atyāhita viśaṅkinīm
ratha sthitā ratha gatā tad pratī kāra karmaṇe
sakhi potriṇi duṣṭasya tarṣa astram idam āgatam
śithilīkurute sainyam asmākam hā vidheḥ kramaḥ
viśuṣka tālu mūlānām vibhraṣṭa āyudha tejasām
śaktīnām maṇḍalena atra samare samupekṣitam

original: na kāpi kurute yuddhaṃ na dhārayati cāyudham /
analyzed: na kā api kurute yuddham na dhārayati ca āyudham
viśuṣka tālu mūla tvāt vaktum api āli na kṣamāḥ

original: īdṛśīnno gatiṃ śrutvā kiṃ vakṣyati maheśvarī /
analyzed: īdṛśīn naḥ gatim śrutvā kim vakṣyati maheśvarī
kṛtā ca apakṛtiḥ daityaiḥ upāyaḥ pravicintyatām
sarvatra dvi aṣṭa sāhasra akṣauhiṇī amatra potriṇi

original: ekāpi śaktirnaivāsti yā tarṣeṇa na pīḍitā // BndP_3,28.53 //
analyzed: ekā api śaktiḥ nā evā asti yā tarṣeṇa na pīḍitā
atrā eva avasare dṛṣṭvā mukta śastrām patākinīm
randhra prahāriṇaḥ hanta bāṇaiḥ nighnanti dānavāḥ
atra upāyaḥ tvayā kāryaḥ mayā ca samara udyame
tvadīya ratha parva sthaḥ sti śīta mahārṇavaḥ
tam ādiśa samastānām śaktīnām tarṣa nuttaye
na alpaiḥ pānīya pāna ādyaiḥ etāsām tarṣa saṃkṣayaḥ
saḥ eva madirā siṃdhuḥ śaktyā ogham tarpayiṣyati
tam ādiśa mahātmānam samara utsāha kāriṇam
sarva tarṣa praśamanam mahā bala vivardhanam
iti ukte daṇḍanāthā sā sat upāyena harṣitā
ājuhāva sudhā siṃdhum ājñām cakra īśvarī raṇe
sa mada alasa rakta akṣaḥ hema ābhaḥ sraj vibhūṣitaḥ
praṇamya daṇḍanāthām tām tad ājñā paripārakaḥ
ātmānam bahudhā kṛtvā taruṇa āditya pāṭalam
kvacid tāpiccha vat śyāmam kvacid ca dhavala dyutim
koṭiśas madhura ādhārā kari hasta sama ākṛtīḥ
vavarṣa siṃdhurājaḥ yam vāyunā bahulīkṛtaḥ
puṣkalāvartaka ādyaiḥ tu kalapa kṣaya balāhakaiḥ

original: niṣicyamāno madhye 'bdhiḥ śaktisainye papāta ha // BndP_3,28.63 //
analyzed: niṣicyamānaḥ madhye bdhiḥ śakti sainye papāta ha
yat gandha āghrāma mātreṇa mṛtaḥ uttiṣṭhate sphuṭam
durbalaḥ prabalaḥ ca syāt tat vavarṣa sura aṃbudhiḥ
parārddha saṃkhyā atītāḥ tāḥ madhu dhārā paraṃparāḥ
prapibantyaḥ pipāsā ārtaiḥ mukhaiḥ śaktayaḥ utthitāḥ
yathā sā madirā siṃdhu vṛṣṭiḥ daityeṣu no patet
tathā sainyasya paritas mahā prākāra maṇḍalam
laghu hasta tayā muktaiḥ śara jātaiḥ sahasraśas
cakāra vismaya karī kadaṃba vana vāsinī
karmaṇā tena sarve pi vismitāḥ marutaḥ bhavan

original: atha tāḥ śaktayo bhūri pibanti sma raṇāntare // BndP_3,28.68 //
analyzed: atha tāḥ śaktayaḥ bhūri pibanti sma raṇa antare
vividhāḥ madirā ādhārāḥ bala utsāha vivardhanīḥ

original: yasyā yasyā manaḥprītī ruciḥ svādo yathāyathā // BndP_3,28.69 //
analyzed: yasyāḥ yasyāḥ manaḥ prītī ruciḥ svādaḥ yathā yathā
tṛtīye yuddha divase prahara dvitaya avadhi
saṃtatam madhya dhārābhiḥ pravavarṣa sura aṃbudhiḥ

original: gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca varā kādaṃbarī tathā /
analyzed: gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca varā kādaṃbarī tathā

original: haitālī lāṅgaleyā ca tālajātāstathā surāḥ // BndP_3,28.71 //
analyzed: haitālī lāṅgaleyā ca tāla jātāḥ tathā surāḥ
kalpavṛkṣa udbhavāḥ divyāḥ nānā deśa samudbhavāḥ
su svādu saurabha ādyāḥ ca śubha gandha sukha pradāḥ
bakula prasava āmodāḥ dhvanantyaḥ budbuda ujjvalāḥ
kaṭukāḥ ca kaṣāyāḥ ca madhurāḥ tikta tā spṛśaḥ
bahu varma samāviṣṭāḥ chedinīḥ picchalāḥ tathā
