śālomārakata abhikhyaḥ catur yojanam ucchritaḥ
pūrvavat gopura ādīnām saṃsthānaiḥ ca su śobhitaḥ
tatra śrī daṇḍanāthāyāḥ dahana ādi vidiś gatāḥ
catvāraḥ nilayāḥ proktāḥ mantriṇī gṛha vistarāḥ
gīti cakra ratha indrasya yāḥ parvāṇi samāśritāḥ
bhaṇḍāsura mahā yuddhe tāḥ devyaḥ tatra jāgrati

original: sarvāḥ sthalyo marakataśreṇibhiḥ khacitāḥ śubhāḥ // BndP_3,34.57 //
analyzed: sarvāḥ sthalyaḥ marakata śreṇibhiḥ khacitāḥ śubhāḥ
hema tāla vana āḍhyāḥ ca sarva vastu samākulāḥ
tatra devyaḥ samastāḥ ca daṇḍanāthā sama śriyaḥ
hala uddharṇa halāt harṇa musalāḥ sañcaranti api
saṃkhyā atītāḥ tālavṛkṣāḥ nava svarṇa vicitritāḥ
yojana āyata kāṇḍāḥ ca dalaiḥ yuktāḥ viśaṅkaṭaiḥ
hema tvacaḥ tisu snigdhāḥ sacchāyāḥ phala bhaṅgurāḥ
āmūlāgram lambamānāḥ tālāḥ hālā ghaṭa ākulāḥ

original: vartante daṇḍanāthāyāḥ prītyarthaṃ śilpibhiḥ kṛtāḥ // BndP_3,34.61 //
analyzed: vartante daṇḍanāthāyāḥ prīti artham śilpibhiḥ kṛtāḥ
tam ca tāla rasa āpūram pītvā a pītvā mada ākulāḥ
jṛṃbhiṇī ādyāḥ cakra devyaḥ hetukā ādyāḥ ca bhairavāḥ
sapta nigraha devyaḥ ca nṛtyanti mada vihvalāḥ
catur vidikṣu daṇḍinyāḥ yatra yatra mahā dṛśaḥ
tatra pūrva ādi digbhāge devī sadṛśa varcasaḥ
unmattabhairavī svapneśī sarvatodiśam
nivāsaḥ daṇḍanāthāyāḥ kevalam tu ābhimānikaḥ
tasyāḥ tu sevā vāsaḥ mahā padma aṭavī sthale
tad kakṣa ati davīyaḥ tvān sevā artham tatra tad gṛhaḥ
atho marakata ākāre śāle tad sapta yojane
tatra sthalāḥ tu sakalāḥ vidrumaiḥ eva nirmitāḥ
tadvat vidruma saṃkāśaḥ brahmā nalina viṣṭaraḥ
brahma lokāt samāgatya sārddham sarvaiḥ muni īśvaraiḥ
sadā śrī lalitā devyāḥ sevana artham atandritaḥ
marīci ādyaiḥ prajā   vartate sākam abdhipa
caturdaśa api vidyāḥ tāḥ upavidyāḥ sahasraśas
catuḥṣaṣṭi kalāḥ ca eva śarīriṇyaḥ mahattarāḥ
prākāre vidruma ākāre brahma loka samāśritāḥ
vartante jagatām ṛddhyai lalitāḥ devatā ājñayā
atha vidruma śālasya anatare māruta yojane
māṇikya maṇḍapa sthāne parītaḥ sarvatodiśam
vartate viṣṇu lokaḥ tu lalitā sevana utsukaḥ
tatra vaiṣṇava loke tu viṣṇuḥ sākṣāt sanātanaḥ

original: caturghā daśadhā caiva tathā dvādaśadhā punaḥ /
analyzed: caturghā daśadhā ca eva tathā dvādaśadhā punar

original: vibhinnamūrtiḥ satataṃ vartate mādhavaḥ sadā // BndP_3,34.72 //
analyzed: vibhinna mūrtiḥ satatam vartate mādhavaḥ sadā
bhaṇḍa asura mahā yuddhe ye śrī devī nakha udbhavāḥ
daśa avatāra devāḥ tu te māṇikya maṇḍape
pūrva kakṣa antarebhyaḥ tu tad kakṣāyām viśeṣataḥ
upari ācchādanā mātram māṇikya dṛṣadām gaṇaiḥ
tatra kakṣa antare devaḥ śaṅkha cakra gadā dharaḥ
bhinnaḥ dvādaśamūrtyā ca pūrva ādi āśāḥ rakṣati
jāmbūnada prabhaḥ cakrī pūrvasyām diśi keśavaḥ
paścāt nārāyaṇaḥ śaṅkhī nīla jīmūta saṃnibhaḥ
indīvara dala śyā maḥ madhumān mādhavaḥ vati

original: govindo dakṣiṇe pārśve dhanvī candraprabho mahān // BndP_3,34.77 //
analyzed: govindaḥ dakṣiṇe pārśve dhanvī candra prabhaḥ mahān
uttare haladhṛk viṣṇuḥ padma kiñjalka saṃnibhaḥ
āgneyyām aravinda ābhaḥ musalī madhusūdanaḥ
trivikramaḥ khaḍgapāṇiḥ nairṛtye cvalana prabhaḥ

original: vāyavyāṃ vāmano vajrī taruṇāditya dīptimān // BndP_3,34.79 //
analyzed: vāyavyām vāmanaḥ vajrī taruṇa āditya dīptimān
īśānyām puṇḍarīka ābhaḥ śrīdharaḥ paṭṭiśa āyudhaḥ

original: vidyutprabho hṛṣīkeśo hyavācyāṃ diśi mudgarī // BndP_3,34.80 //
analyzed: vidyutprabhaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ hi avācyām diśi mudgarī
māṇikya maṇḍapa sthānam anulomyena veṣṭate
sarva āyudhaḥ sarva śaktiḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ
indragopaka saṃkāśaḥ pāśa hastaḥ parājitaḥ
dāmodaraḥ tu sarva ātmā lalitā bhakti nirbharaḥ
māṇikya maṇḍapa sthānam vilomena viveṣṭate
iti dvādaśabhiḥ dehaiḥ bhagavān ambuja īkṣaṇaḥ
māṇikya maṇḍapa gataḥ viṣṇu loke virājate
atha nānā ratna śālā antare māruta yojane
sahasrastambhakam nāma maṇḍapam su manoharam
nānā ratnaiḥ tu khacitam nānā ratnaiḥ alaṅkṛtam
nānā ratna kṛtaḥ śālaḥ tuṅgaḥ tatra abhivartate
ekā paṅktiḥ sahasraiḥ tu stambhaḥ tiyak pravartate

original: tādṛśāḥ paṅktayo bahvyaḥ stambhānāṃ tu caturdiśam // BndP_3,34.87 //
analyzed: tādṛśāḥ paṅktayaḥ bahvyaḥ stambhānām tu caturdiśam
upari ācchādanam ca api pūrvavat ratna dārubhiḥ
śiva lokaḥ tatra mahān jāgarti sphurita dyutiḥ
śaiva āgamāḥ mūrtimantaḥ tatra aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ smṛtāḥ
nandi bhṛṅgi mahākāla pramukhāḥ tatra ca uttamāḥ
ṣaḍviṃśat tattva devāḥ ca gajavaktrāḥ sahasraśas
śiva loka uttame tasmin sahasra stambha maṇḍape
īśānaḥ sarva vidyānām adhipaḥ candraśekharaḥ
śaivyā dṛṣṭyā sva bhaktānām lalitā mantra siddhaye
antar bahis tamaḥ puñja nirbhedana paṭī yasīm
mahā prakāśa rūpām tām medhā śakti prakāśayan
sarvajñaḥ sarvakartā ca sahasra stambha maṇḍape
vartamānaḥ mahādeva devīḥ śrī bhakti nirbharaḥ
tat tat śālān samāśritya vartate kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍamahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastya saṃvāde lalitopākhyāne dikpālādiśivalokāntarakathanaṃ nā catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍa mahāpurāṇe uttara bhāge hayagrīva agastya saṃvāde lalitā upākhyāne dikpāla ādi śiva loka antara kathanam nā catustriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
hayagrīvaḥ uvāca
atha vā api itra ya ādīnām kakṣyā bhedān pracakṣmahe
eṣām śravaṇa mātreṇa jāyate śrī mahodayaḥ
sahasra stambha śālasya ātara māruta yojane
manaḥ nāma mahā śālaḥ sarva ratna vicitritaḥ
pūrvavat gopura dvāra kapāṭa argala saṃyutaḥ
tad madhya kakṣyā bhāgaḥ tu sarvā api amṛtavāpikā
yat pītvā yoginaḥ siddhāḥ vajra kāyāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: bhavanti puruṣāḥ prājñāstadeva hi rasāyanam // BndP_3,35.4 //
analyzed: bhavanti puruṣāḥ prājñāḥ tat eva hi rasāyanam
vāpyām amṛta mayyām tu vartate toya tām gatam
tad gandha āghrāṇa mātreṇa siddhikāntā patiḥ bhavet
a spṛśan api vindhaya are puruṣaḥ kṣīṇa kalmaṣaḥ
ubhayoḥ śālayoḥ pārśve sudhā vāpī taṭa dvaye
adhakrośa samāyāmāḥ anyāḥ sarvāḥ ca vāpikāḥ

original: caturyojanadūraṃ tu talaṃ tasyā jalāntare // BndP_3,35.7 //
analyzed: catur yojana dūram tu talam tasyāḥ jala antare
sopāna āvalayaḥ tasyāḥ nānā ratna vicitritāḥ
svarṇa varṇāḥ ratna varṇāḥ tasyām haṃsāḥ ca sārasāḥ
āsphoṭyate taṭa dvandva taraṅgaiḥ manda cañcalaiḥ
pakṣiṇaḥ tat jalam pītvā rasāyana mayam navam
ajara amara tām prāptāḥ tatra vindhya niṣūdana
sadā kūjita lakṣeṇa tatra kāraṇḍava dvijāḥ
japanti lalitā devyāḥ mantram eva mahattaram
paritas vāpikā cakra pariveṣaṇa bhūyasā
na tatra gantu mārgaḥ sti naukā vāhanam antarā
ājñayā kevalam tatra mantriṇī daṇḍa nāthayoḥ
tārā nāma mahā śaktiḥ vartate toraṇeśvarī
bahvyaḥ tatra utpala śyāmāḥ tārāyāḥ paricārikāḥ
ratna naukā sahasreṇa sarasī jale
aparam pāram āyānti punar yānti param taṭam
vīṇā veṇu mṛdaṅga ādi vādayantyaḥ muhur muhur
koṭiśas tatra tārāyāḥ nāvikyaḥ nava yauvanāḥ

original: muhurgāyanti nṛtyanti devyāḥ puṇyatamaṃ yaśaḥ // BndP_3,35.15 //
analyzed: muhur gāyanti nṛtyanti devyāḥ puṇyatamam yaśaḥ
aritra pāṇayaḥ kāścid kāścid śūga ambu pāṇayaḥ
pibantyaḥ tat sudhā toyam saṃcarantyaḥ tarī śataiḥ
tāsām naukā vāhikānām śaktīnām śyāmala tviṣām
pradhāna bhūtā tārā aṃbā jala ogha śamana kṣamā
ājñām vinā tayoḥ tārā mantriṇī daṇḍadhārayoḥ

original: trinetrasyāpi no datte vāpikāṃbhasi santaram // BndP_3,35.18 //
analyzed: trinetrasya api naḥ datte vāpikā aṃbhasi santaram
gāyantīnām calantīnām naukābhiḥ maṇi cārubhiḥ
mahā rājñī mahā audāryam patantīnām pade pade
pibantīnām madhu bhṛśam māṇikya caṣaka udaraiḥ
pratinaukam maṇi gṛhe vasantīnām manohare
tārā taraṇi śaktīnām
kāścid naukāḥ suvarṇa āḍhyāḥ kāścid ratna kṛtāḥ mune
makara ākāram āpannāḥ kāścid naukāḥ mṛga ānanāḥ
kāścid siṃha āsanāḥ nāvaḥ kāścid dantāvala ānanāḥ
ittham vicitra rūpābhiḥ nauṅkābhiḥ pariveṣṭitā
tārā aṃbā mahatīm naukām adhigamya virājate
anuloma vilomābhyām sañcāram vāpikā jale

original: tanvānā satataṃ tārā kakṣyāmenāṃ hi rakṣati // BndP_3,35.24 //
analyzed: tanvānā satatam tārā kakṣyām enām hi rakṣati
manaśālasya antarāle sapta yojana dūrataḥ
buddhiśālaḥ iti khyātaḥ catur yojanam ucchritaḥ
tad madhya kakṣyā bhāge sti sarvā api ānanda vāpikā
tatra divyam mahā madyam bakula āmoda meduram
pratapta kanaka chāyam tat jala tvena varttate
ānanda vāpikā agādhāḥ pūrvavat parikīrttitāḥ
sopāna ādi kramaḥ ca eva pakṣiṇāḥ tatra pūrvavat
tatratyam salilam madyam pāyampāyam taṭa sthitāḥ
viharanti mada unmattāḥ śaktayaḥ mada pāṭalāḥ
sākṣāt ca vāruṇī devī tatra naukā adhināyikā
yām sudhāmālinīm āhuḥ yām ā huḥ amṛta īśvarīm
sā tatra maṇi naukā stha śakti senā samāvṛtā
īṣat āloka mātreṇa trailokya mada dāyinī
taruṇa āditya saṅkāśa mada ārakta kapola bhūḥ
vahantī madirā pūrṇam caṣakam lolat utpalam

original: pakvaṃ piśitakhaṇḍaṃ ca maṇipātre tathānyake // BndP_3,35.32 //
analyzed: pakvam piśita khaṇḍam ca maṇi pātre tathā anyake
vāruṇī taraṇi śreṇī nāyikā tatra rājate
sā api ājñayā eva sarveṣām mantriṇī daṇḍanāthayoḥ
dadāti vāpī taraṇam trinetrasya api nā anyathā
atha buddhi mahā śālā antare māruta yojane
ahaṅkāra mahā śālaḥ pūrvavat gopura anvitaḥ
tayoḥ tu śālayoḥ madhye kakṣyā bhūḥ akhilā mune
tat mahā yoginām antar manaḥ māruta pūritam
suṣumṇa daṇḍa vivare jāgarti parama amṛtam
tat eva tasyāḥ salilam vāpikāyāḥ tapodhana
pūrvavat taṭa sopāna pakṣi naukāḥ hi tāḥ smṛtāḥ
tatra naukeśvarī devī klarukullā iti viśrutā
tamāla śyāmala ākārā śyāma kañcuka dhāriṇī
naukā īśvarībhiḥ anyābhiḥ sva samānābhiḥ āvṛtā
ratna aritra karā nityam ullasat mada māṃsalā
paritas bhrāmyati mune maṇi naukā adhirohiṇī
vāpikā payasā agādhā pūrvavat parikīrtitā
ahaṅkārasya śālasya antare māruta yojane
sūrya biṃba mahā śālaḥ catur yojana mucchritaḥ
sūryasya api mahān āsīt yat abhūt aruṇa udayaḥ
tad madhya kakṣyā vasudhā khacitā kuravindakaiḥ
tatra bālā tapaḥ udgāre lalitā parameśvarī
ati tīvra tapaḥ taptvā sūryaḥ labhata tām dyutim
graha rāśi gaṇāḥ sarve nakṣatrāṇi api tārakāḥ

original: te 'treva hi tapastaptvā lokabhāsakatāṃ gatāḥ // BndP_3,35.44 //
analyzed: te tris iva hi tapaḥ taptvā loka bhāsaka tām gatāḥ
mārtaṇḍabhairavaḥ tatra bhinnaḥ dvādaśadhā mune
śaktibhiḥ taijasībhiḥ ca koṭi saṃkhyābhiḥ anvitaḥ
mahā prakāśa rūpaḥ ca mada aruṇa vilocanaḥ
kaṅkoli taru khaṇḍeṣu nityam krīḍā rasa utsukaḥ
vartate vindhya darpāre pāre yaḥ tad maya sthitaḥ
mahāprakāśa nāmrā asti tasya śaktiḥ mahīyasī
cakṣuṣmatī aparā śaktiḥ chāyā devī parā smṛtā
ittham tisṛbhiḥ riṣṭābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ parivāritaḥ

original: lalitāyā maheśānyāḥ sadā vidyā hṛdā japan // BndP_3,35.48 //
analyzed: lalitāyāḥ maheśānyāḥ sadā vidyāḥ hṛdā japan
tad bhaktānām indriyāṇi bhāsvarāṇi prakāśayan
bahis antar tamaḥ jālam sa mūlam avamardayan
tatra bāla ātapa udgāre bhāti mārtaṇḍa bhairavaḥ
sūryabimba mahā śālā antare māruta yojane
candra bimba mayaḥ śālaḥ catur yojanam ucchritaḥ
pūrvavat gopura dvāra kapāṭa argala saṃyutaḥ
tad madhya bhūḥ samastā api candrikādvāram ucyate
tatra eva candrikādvāre tapaḥ taptvā su dāruṇam
atri netra samutpannaḥ candramāḥ kāntim āyayau
atra śrī somanātha ākhyaḥ vartate nirmala ākṛtiḥ
piban ca ṣaka sampūrṇam nirmalam candrikā amṛtam
saptaviṃśati nakṣatra śaktibhiḥ parivāritaḥ
sadā pūrṇa nija ākāraḥ niṣkalaṅkaḥ nija ākṛtiḥ
tatra eva candrikādvāre vartate bhagavān śaśī
lalitāyāḥ japaiḥ dhyānaiḥ stotraiḥ pūjā śataiḥ api
aśvinī ādi yutaḥ tatra kālam nayati candramāḥ
anyāḥ ca śaktayaḥ tārā nāmadheyāḥ sahasraśas

original: santi tasyaiva nikaṭe sā kakṣā tatpra pūritā // BndP_3,35.58 //
analyzed: santi tasya eva nikaṭe sā kakṣā tad pra pūritā
atha candrasya śālasya antare māruta yojane
śṛṅgāraḥ nāma śālaḥ sti catur yojanam ucchritaḥ
śṛṅgāra āgāra rūpaiḥ tu kaustubhaiḥ iva nirmitaḥ
mahā śṛṅgāra parikhā tad madhye vasudhā akhilā
parikhā valaye tatra śṛṅgāra rasa pūrite
śṛṅgāra śaktayaḥ santi nānā bhūṣaṇa bhāsurāḥ
tatra naukā sahasreṇa saṃcarantyaḥ mada uddhatāḥ

original: upāsate sadā sattaṃ naukāsthaṃ kusumāyudham // BndP_3,35.62 //
analyzed: upāsate sadā sattam naukā stham kusumāyudham
sa tu saṃmohayati eva viśvam sammohana ādibhiḥ
viśikhaiḥ akhilān lokān lalita ājñā vaśaṃvadaḥ
tad prabhāveṇa saṃmūḍhāḥ mahāpadma aṭavī sthalam
vanitum śuddha veṣāḥ ca lalitā bhakti nirbharāḥ
sāvadhānena manasā yānti padma aṭadī sthalam
na gantum pārayati eva sura siddha narāḥ surāḥ
brahma viṣṇu maheśāḥ tu śuddha cittāḥ svabhāvataḥ
tad ājñayā param yānti mahāpadma aṭavī sthalam
saṃsāriṇaḥ ca rāga andha bahu saṃkalpa kalpanāḥ
mahā kulāḥ ca puruṣāḥ vikalpa jñāna dhūsarāḥ
prabhūta rāga gahanāḥ prauḍha vyāmoha dāyinīm
mahā śṛṅgāra parikhā antaritum na vicakṣaṇāḥ
yasmāt ajeya saindaryaḥ trailokya jana mohanaḥ
tasya sarvam atikramya mahatām api mohanam

original: mahāpadmāṭavīṃ gantuṃ na ko 'pi bhavati kṣamaḥ // BndP_3,35.69 //
analyzed: mahāpadma aṭavīm gantum na kaḥ pi bhavati kṣamaḥ
atha śṛṅgāra śālasya antarāle sapta yojane
cintāmaṇi gṛham nāma cakrarāja mahā ālayaḥ
tad madhya bhūḥ samastā api paritas ratna bhūṣitā
mahāpadmāṭavī nāma sarva saubhāgya dāyinī
śṛṅgāra ākhyā mahākāla paryantam gopuram mune
catur dikṣu api evam eva gopurāṇām vyavasthitiḥ
sarva dikṣu tad uktāni mune

original: śālāstu viṃśatiḥ proktāḥ pañcasaṃkhyādhikāḥ śubhāḥ // BndP_3,35.73 //
analyzed: śālāḥ tu viṃśatiḥ proktāḥ pañca saṃkhyā adhikāḥ śubhāḥ
sarveṣām api śālānām mūlam yojana saṃmitam

original: padmāṭavīsthalaṃ vakṣye sāvadhāno mune śṛṇu // BndP_3,35.74 //
analyzed: padma aṭavī sthalam vakṣye sa avadhānaḥ mune śṛṇu
samasta ratna khacite tatra ṣaṣ yojana antare
mahā kāṇḍāni saṃti vai
kāṇḍāḥ tu yojana āyāmāḥ mṛdubhiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ vṛtāḥ
patrāṇi tāla daśaka mātra āyāmāni saṃti vai
kesarāḥ ca sarojānām pañca tāla samāyatāḥ
daśa tāla samunnamraḥ karṇikāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
atyanta komalāni atra sadā vikasitāni ca
